132.content:
Jedi Council, Coruscant

Anakin Skywalker and his apprentice Ashoka Tano were on their way to the Jedi High Council, per request of Yoda, the most powerful Jedi master in all of the galaxy.

"I'm nervous, what do you think he wants from us?", Ashoka asked Anakin.

"You can never know when it comes to Yoda, just try to keep calm," he said reassuringly.

This gave the young Jedi a sense of comfort, as Anakin was always able to put her at ease. The two Jedi arrived at the High Council, and were surprised to see that only Yoda was in the room.

"Master Yoda, what is it that you have requested from us?", Anakin said.

"Losing this war, we are. Not much time left. A push, we need."

"A push, what do you mean?", Ashoka asked nervously

"An artifact. Give us edge over Sith, it may."

"What is this artifact, and where is it?", said Anakin.

"A holocron, located in the ruins of Dagobah."

"It shall be done.", Anakin said with confidence.

As soon as they were excused by Yoda, Anakin and Ashoka bought a ship and made their way to the abandoned swamp planet that is Dagobah.

When they arrive....
132.title: The Last Hope

choices: Get Ahsoka and leave the planet to her help
Look around for signs of either the sith of more substantial pieces the holocron
1321.content:
After the discovery that Kamino had been erased from the jedi archives, many other planets were have found to be removed, supposedly by Count Dooku before he left the order. Dagobah was one such planet, there must have been a reason to keep the existence of the planet from the jedi.
With this in mind Anakin and Ahsoka not surprised to see two figures in dark robes standing in front of the holocron. “You jedi are so rude,” one without look around, “showing up to place when you are clearly not invited,” one of the figures turned around revealing himself to be none other than Count Dooku.
“Count Dooku,” said Anakin in angry tones.
“Not hiding behind an army of droids,” taunt Ahsoka.
“and you two don’t seem to have the clones to do your dirty work,” replied the Count, “beside as you no doubt know this artefact requires a personal touch.”
“Why?” blurted out Ahsoka her curiosity betraying her.
“You mean you don’t know?” said the other figure turning around to reveal the snarling features of Asajj Ventress.
“And they will continue not to know,” said Dooku igniting his lightsabre, everyone else quickly followed suit. “Now we will know once and for all,” said Dooku his voice bouncing around the overgrown ruins of the temple, “Who is the strongest.”

As one they leapt at each other, after a few brief seconds of a two versus two melee, the combatants broke off into two groups with Ahsoka fighting Asajj and Anakin against Dooku, this continued on for several minutes with impressive display of swordsmanship and training in the force on both sides, Anakin knew that time was against them whilst he had face Dooku several times before the Count had shown his experience would more often than not triumph over Anakin’s vigour, and whilst Snips was good for her age she would not be able to hold off Ventress for long. Just then he notice that Asajj had managed to get Ahsoka in a force choke, breaking off from Dooku for a second Anakin sent a wave of force to not Ventress off her feet. This worked but Dooku took the opportunity to the same to Anakin who was sent flying into the podium on which the holocron rested. Ahsoka free from the grip rushed over to help her master, but the Sith closed in for the kill. All four locked blades just over the holocron, where they were held for several seconds before they slipped and made contact, they was a massive explosion of white light.

Anakin open his eyes, he was still in temple and despite his body aching all over he leapt up snatching his lightsabre from the ground, but both the sith were nowhere to be seen. Ahsoka was on the ground no far away alive but defiantly unconscious. He also noticed the ground to be littered with bits of what was once the holocron.
What should he do…
1321.title: The Sith have beaten them to it.

choices: In the middle of a battle.
13211.content:
Ahsoka needed help and Anakin himself was in no state to fight, he slung Ahsoka over his shoulder and scoped up the some of the holocron remains. He made his way back to the ship all the while waiting for Dooku or Ventress to leap out and attack but he made it back to the ship without incident. He lay layed Ahsoka down on a couple of chairs and put the holocron pieces on another. He took off again waiting for the moment when an army of droids appears and opened fire, but ship took off from the swamp with no more than squelch.

Once he had made the jump to lightspeed Anakin went to check on Ahsoka, she was still unconscious, the ship did not have the medical facilities to she what full state she was in but there was a republic fleet in near by Sluis Van system, where it was preparing to attack the separatist stronghold on the planet who was the system’s namesake, one of the ships in the fleet should have the adequate medical facilites. There were ways of healing people with force but Anakin did not have the patience to learn such a technique. He then examined remains of the holocron, the fragments that once was part of the holocron that pulsed with so much energy it seemed alive now just sat there dully like parts of a broken egg shell. He could gain nothing from them, there was a faint trace of the force on them but that was to be expected.

After a while an insistent beeping told Anakin that the ship was about to come about of hyperspace, he made his way to the cockpit to see the star stop zipping past and the republic fleet.
13211.title: Get Ahsoka and leave the planet to her help

132111.content:
The brief flashes of light told Anakin the there was a battle going on even before he identified the ships to be of opposing sides. “Why is it never easy?” he said aloud to himself before making his way to the back of the ship and placing the pieces of the holocron in a secure container then sitting Ahsoka up on one of the seats and strapping her in, no doubt he would need to pull some fancy maneuverers whilst making his way to one of the cruisers of the republic fleet and it was best to batten down the hatches as it were. He returned to the cockpit in time to the strap himself in and switch deflector shield to front and increase power to the engines at expense to the weapons. The republic fleet seemed to have the upper hand and should be able deal with what appeared to be a patrol group rather than a full attack fleet, never the less it would only take one stray bolt from one of the larger ship of either side to vaporise Anakin, Ahsoka and the entire ship.

As their ship came into range to be noticed by the combatants Anakin opened up communications on republic channels and said “This is Anakin Skywalker contacting Acclamtor Assault ship Implacable, do you read me?”
It was a couple of seconds be there was a reply which was slightly distorted by static but Anakin could easily tell without a doubt that it was a clone rather than a recruited officer. “This is the Implacable sir, sorry to have not caught you at a better time but as you can tell we got our hands bit full at the moment.”
“I’ve got an injured jedi aboard along with…,” he hesitated, “some remains of a jedi artefact.”
The was a couple seconds again before the reply came, “I’m sending you a coarse it should keep you clear of most of the major areas of fighting, but be careful of vultures.”
“As always Skywalker out.”

A few minutes later Anakin was stepping out into the hanger of the Implacable with Ahsoka carried in his arms and the holocron remain in a bag, even before he stepped off the boarding ramp a team of medics had rushed up with a floating stretcher. A couple shots with the ship but had little effect other than the sound the made, by now the only shots being fired were rear guns as the separatists retreated or from a ship in deaths throws.
He laid Ahsoka on the stretcher then…
132111.title: In the middle of a battle.

1321111.content:
A couple of rooms were found for Anakin and Ahsoka to use during the stay, Anakin entered his and open holographic communications to the Jedi council.
A blue flickering ghost like image of Mace Windu and Yoda appeared before Anakin.
“Skywalker,” said Windu, “how did your task go?”
“There were complications,” replied Anakin, “Dooku and Ventress were there.”
Both of the masters look much more concerned, “Did they get the Holocron?” asked Windu urgently.
“No master, it was…destroyed during the fighting,” answered Anakin, this seem to be better than the sith getting the holocron but was still a blow. “Masters,” said Anakin, “what did the holocron contain?”
“Contained the souls of many jedi from one of the wars with the sith long ago it did,” said Yoda in his rearranged speech pattern.
“How would that of helped us?” asked Anakin.
“Draw upon knowledge and wisdom lost to us, we could of.”
“I’m sorry masters that it is destroyed, if…” started Anakin.
“Destroyed, not destroyed young Skywalker merely misplaced, gone somewhere else, sense the spirits I can,” said Yoda.
“You mean there might be a chance to find them still?” asked Anakin hope rising in voice, “Where?”
“Exactly know, I do not, Meditate on it I will,” said Yoda, “you and your padawan return to the Jedi temple.”
“At once master, Skywalker out,” said Anakin before switching off the Hologram.

“Do you have any idea where the spirits are gone?” asked Windu after the hologram was switched off.
“Know already I fear, wrong I hope am I.” Mace Windu gave a slight nod in response.

Anakin was frustrated, he failed the order in its time of need and now he and Ahsoka were being removed from the task, ‘all because the sith happened to be there, if it was really that important why not send an entire army there?’ he thought to himself.
He decided to go and check on how Ahsoka was doing when he got there Anakin saw that…
1321111.title: Contacted the Jedi Council to report on the mis...

13211112.content:
Ahsoka was just coming around when Anakin arrive at the med-bay, “Well Ms. Tano you seem to be perfectly healthy,” said the medical droid before continuing, “a slight concussion, you might still be a bit dizzy but all in all you should be ready for duty in the next couple of days.”
“But I can’t lay around doing nothing I got to be up and fighting the separatists,” said Ahsoka.
“Easy Snips,” said Anakin walking up, “We’ve been order back to the jedi temple.”
“What happened to the holo…” began Ahsoka as soon as she saw Anakin.
“I’ll tell you later,” he said.

It was later.
The two jedi were in one of the two rooms that that had been procured for their stay, Anakin explained what had happen since the battle on Dagobah.
“So you’re saying that the holocron was destroyed?” asked Ahsoka after Anakin had finished.
“I’m not sure, the holocron itself was destroyed,” said Anakin gesturing to the remains of the holocron which he had earlier laid out on a table, “but Master Yoda believes that whatever was inside, the souls or something, have gone somewhere else.”
“I never heard of a holocron contain soul before,” said Ahsoka.
“Neither have I but it’s not too unlikely seeing what else the force has achieved.”
“And Master Yoda thinks they’re gone somewhere else?”
“Yes.”
“Another holocron?”
“Perhaps.”
“Would still be on Dagobah or do you think the souls could of go to another planet?” asked Ahsoka.
“It doesn’t matter,” snapped Anakin, “we’ve been order back to Coruscant either way.”
He didn’t say they had been taken off the case, but his voice managed to convey it, “I’m sorry master that I fail you,” said Ahsoka.
“Don’t be,” said Anakin wearily, “It wasn’t your fault, it was just our bad luck that the sith got there to.” He scooped up the remains of the Holocron and put them in a bag before leaving to his cabin next door. Just as he was about to leave, he thought he heard a faint whispering but decided it must have been his imagination.

It was about a nearly half a standard day later, after inquiring Anakin found that he and Ahsoka could get back to Coruscant aboard a corvette which was due to make the jump to hyperspace in a few hours. Anakin was just about to knock on the door to Ahsoka’s room when he heard a strangled scream from inside.
Anakin almost instinctively jab to door controls to open it, the door wasn’t locked and slide open, Anakin rushed and a strange sight meet his eyes.
Ahsoka was standing next to her bed clutching her stomach which was bulging as though she just had extremely large meal.
“What happened to you?” asked Anakin urgently.
“I don’t know,” said Ahsoka looking up from her swollen middle with a frightened look on her face, “one minute I was drifting off to sleep and the next…” She gestured at her belly which made her look as though she was four months pregnant, but given that jedi are celibate and the rate at which it happened Anakin considered it unlikely. Over the grunts of Ahsoka, as she tried to push her stomach back in with little avail, Anakin heard the faint whispering like before but slightly louder now.
“Do you hear that, a sort of faint whispering,” said Anakin tilting his head a fraction trying to listen.
But Ahsoka was too distraught to care, “Don’t you care that I happen to ha…hmmmpph.”
“ssshh quiet,” said Anakin putting a hand over Ahsoka’s mouth.
Whilst the ship still hummed and there were distant sounds of an army in wartime both the jedi could hear a quiet indistinct whispering. “Where is it coming from?” ask Ahsoka pulling Anakin’s hand away to speak.
“I think it’s coming from you,” said Anakin he ducked down and placed an ear to his padawan’s swollen middle.
“HEY!!! What are you doing?!” said Ahsoka stepping back her arms wrapped around her bloated belly.
“The whispering coming from inside your stomach,” said Anakin with a look of slight fear, but it was nothing to the look of panic on Ahsoka face as she looked down at her distended midriff and saw Anakin was right.
“What’s going on?” she said sitting down heavily, “What’s happening to me? Was it that holocron?”
“Maybe,” said “Anakin, “there is a lot unknown about the force, and the galaxy maybe it was something on that planet.”
“But the medical said there was nothing wrong with me,” said Ahsoka as though reasoning might change what was happening.
“Well maybe it is time to have another one,” said Anakin.

The next medical showed,,,

132111121.content:
The medical droid ran a scanner across Ahsoka's middle, the orange bulge looking like a rising moon from her point of view, this was the last test both the jedi thought it would be the first one but the droid insisted on doing a variety of other things first.
"Well," said Ahsoka sitting up, "did you find out is wrong with me?"
"After analyzing you again, I have come to the conclusion that you are pregnant but ther..." said the droid
"WHAT?!" exclaimed both Ahsoka and her master.
"That's what the tests now indicate, but..." continued the medical droid.
"It better be a big but," said Anakin, causing a self conscious Ahsoka to tentatively feel her rear to see if it was any bigger. To her ever increasing horror it was, but even if if i wasn't she would of thought is was.
"but...there's no baby," said the droid.
"What how?"
"Her body shows all the signs, hormone increases, cessation of the menstrual cycle...," the droid had the decency to pause before saying, "weight gain, every thing is there to say her body is preparing for motherhood except there is no fetus."
"The wait is causing the bulge in her..." Anakin searched for a word that wouldn't upset Ahsoka any more, "midriff?"
"Some sort of gas presumably but without further..."
"GAS!? Are you telling me I'm pregnant with a fart?" said Ahsoka clutching swollen stomach her anger rising.
"Of course not that would be if..." began the medical droid.
"That will be all," ushering his padawan out of the med lab.
"Why are going we haven't found out what was wrong with me," said Ahsoka dropping the cloak over he belly, even though most of the crew was clones or service droids, neither of whom were able to be judgmental, she did not want it to be widely known that she was burgeoning with an unborn gas bubble.
"We weren't going to, not from the med droid, even the most well program droid can only make judgments on what it knows rather than speculation, and according to the information at hand you are pregnant without a child."
"But how?"
"I think it is something to do with force and we'll ask the masters when we get back to Coruscant."
Fear gripped Ahsoka in a different way at the mention of the masters, "But conduct that leads to reproduction is forbidden by the jedi order I'm sure to expelled from the order, you can't tell them."
"But you're not pregnant, there's no child within you," said Anakin hiding the fact that he was also fearful of the masters' response to Ahsoka mystical motherhood, especially Obi-wan's. "They can't punish you for something that wasn't you fault. Besides if you body is really simulating a pregnancy then they will find out sooner or later. We might as well collect our stuff and head over to the corvette now, it will be leaving soon."

Later over on the corvette Ahsoka was given another room to use.
"I will be another few hours before we reach Coruscant. You might want to catch up on some sleep," said Anakin, "that's what I'll be doing," and with that he left to his room across the hall.
It took some time for Ahsoka to drift off, even with the slither of light from under the door Ahsoka could see the dome of her belly rising in front of her, made all the more bigger in her point of view by lying down. Occasionally her hand would accidentally brush against it causing her to shudder, but eventually she did drift off to sleep.
In her dream Ahsoka floated in blackness, her belly was massive but indeterminately so, as dreams so often are. In some ways it was large as an AT-TE walker at the same time being big enough that she could only just get her finger tips to touch when reaching around it and several sizes in between but always it was big, much bigger than a typical pregnancy for a human or Togruta. There was also the whispering, louder than before but still indistinct, she moaned as she felt her skin stretch and the whispering get even louder.

When she woke up...

1321111211.content:
Ahsoka groggily sat up rubbing her eyes, she looked down to see her belly had grown even more a definite curve bulging out from her and making her to appear 6 months pregnant. Ahsoka gave a half strange scream, which came out sounding like a whimper when she saw this. After a few seconds of closing and shaking her head, hoping it was all a dream, Ahsoka open her eyes again to see it wasn't. She glanced over at the mirror on the wall of her cabin apprehensive of seeing the full extent of changes her body had made, after a second or two she heaved her self to her feet and awkwardly made her way over to it. She looked at her profile view her heart sank to see that from this angle her 'bump' was even more pronounced. She ran her hands over the burgeoning orange semi-sphere feel a wave of comfort as she rubbed the taut skin. She the cup her growing bust under one hand getting a feel for the size of the cleavage that her top was having trouble to contain, while her other hand had slid down to gingerly rub her also increasingly large backside.

Ahsoka spent the next few minutes in silence, transfixed at her growing body, her hands caressing her swelling curves hardly believing that it were her own body. She had just noticed her belly button was becoming increasingly shallow and started to investigate it when the sound of footsteps in the corridor outside broke her out of her reveriy. She hurriedly began to put a her covering robes on, struggling in her panic. She had almost finished putting the robes on (her belly still peaking out between the part in the middle) when the door open to reveal Anakin.

"We've just arrived above Coruscant, the council request an immediate meeting when we arrive at the temple," he said while looking her over, there a few seconds of silence before Anakin said "You've grown," gesturing to his padawan's increasingly swollen middle.
Ahsoka blushed at this and said "is it that obvious?" in a voice of for bravado to cover her embarrassment.
"Either way the council should have an idea of what to do once we show them," said Anakin.

A sudden wave of paranoia and fear swept over Ahsoka and she could hear the faint whispering, "are you sure that's a good idea?" she asked as she subconsciously wrapped her arms around her belly.
"Given that they are the ones who tasked as on this mission and that they are the masters of the jedi order I say it is a very good idea," replied Anakin.
"I know but..." said Ahsoka her mind racing, she wasn't sure why she was suddenly apprehensive about informing the council about her current predicament, perhaps it was simple teenage embarrassment and being ashamed of her changing body.

The masters on the council might be wise but they were old (very old in some cases) amd didn't understand the hormonal time that adolescence was (possibly not even going through puberty in some species cases) Ahsoka had started her journey through puberty few years earlier and a new wave of hormones that were now flooding her system didn't help herself esteem, she didn't was to stand there while the wizened council members prodded and poked the taut skin of her swollen belly, or to have everyone stare at her and be known as the pregnant Jedi behind her back. There was another reason to her fear, for whatever reason she felt an instinct to protect whatever was ever was growing inside her, even though it was medically gas, and the idea of something growing inside her still horrified and repulsed Ahsoka, she still felt that the less people knew about the condition the better.
Suddenly an idea occurred to Ahsoka "...how did the Sith know where to find the holocron? there clearly must be spy somewhere and I don't think we should tell anyone until the have been caught," she said in a rush.
Anakin gave a thoughtful noise, most Jedi would reject the idea of going behind the council's back out of hand but Anakin was somewhat rebellious to ruling Jedi body.

Eventually he decided to....

13211112111.title: Another Problem for Ahsoka's Condition

132111121112.content:
Ahsoka saw the orange curve of her belly and noticed that it had slipped out between the sides of her robe and went to readjust it so it would cover her swollen middle, to her horror she found she wasn't able to. Her belly hadn't slipped out of her robe, it had out grown it!

"Uh master we have slight problem," she said.
"What is it?," said Anakin glancing over his shoulder at her for a second, "I am quite busy here," he continued gesturing to the shuttle's controls. She in turn gestured to her belly poking out of her robes. "You may want to cover that up," said Anakin turning back to flying the ship.
"I can't," said Ahsoka and waited for him to turn around again before demonstrating her inability to cover up her bulging belly.
Anakin was silent for a moment before saying, "when we get back you wait here and I'll collect some robes that cover your..." he trailed off at the feeling of anger Ahsoka radiated through the force.
"Cover my what?" she said it crisp voice putting her hands her hips, which she was too angry to notice had become wider since last night.
"...your current shape," Anakin answered in the most tactful way possible as he landed the shuttle on one of the smaller landing platforms on the jedi temple, "the important thing is we get you back to the council to examine you and find out what's going on inside you," he said then disembarked leaving Ahsoka alone except for the faint whispering emanating from inside her and her doubts.

Once again Ahsoka had the dreaded thought of standing in the middle of the council chamber with masters surrounding her and peering and poking her swollen body, endlessly debating what was to be done as though she was a thing, a container to something far more important. She sat down on the floor of the shuttle her back against the wall and looked down at her belly which now made her look full term and ready to deliver. She thought about running away (though 'running' might not be the correct word), she could take the shuttle somewhere else, uses a piece of tarp from the shuttle's repair kit as a rudimentary cloak (it would still be better than what most of the underworld of Coruscant wore) and she would...what? The plan really didn't have an end goal only to spare her the embarrassment of appearing like this in front of her peers.

At that point...

13211112111211211.content:
When Ahsoka opened her eyes, she saw that before her stood Padme. Staring at the swollen female Jedi before her, with her eyes clearly glued to the Padawans ballooned out orb.

"Oh...Princess Amidal, I'm sorry I didn't hear you come in." Ahsoka said, as she grunted trying to stand up "I guess my meditation was much deeper than I expected."

132111121112121.title: It was someone she knew

1321111211121211.content:
Ahsoka heard some footsteps coming up the boarding ramp and at first, thought it was Anakin, but it was too soon for him to have come back and listening closer she could hear who ever it was, was lighter than Anakin.
Ahsoka cursed inside her head for not locking the shuttle door, and now she wouldn’t have enough time to struggle to her feet and do it. She barely was able to adjust her position to conceal the bulge of her midriff behind her robes and legs, before Barriss Offee fellow padawn and friend of Ahsoka cautiously walked into the shuttle.

“There you are,” said Barriss brightening up upon spotting Ahsoka, “what are you doing in here?”
“Barriss!” exclaimed Ahsoka angling herself as best she could to prevent her friend spotting her bulging middle, “What are you doing here?” she said in a way to bide time.
“I ran into Anakin in the temple and asked him where you were, he answer was very strange and I was afraid something had happened to you, like you were captured or worse,” said Barriss, “so I decided to check the ship he arrived on to find out and here you are.”
Ahsoka desperately tried to think of a way to send Barriss away or at least prevent her from asking…
“What are you doing down there anyway?” asked Barriss.
Ahsoka sighed only a few minutes at the jedi temple and already her secret was going to be found out, she proffered her hands to Barriss and said, “help me up and I’ll tell you, but be prepared to be surprised.”
Barriss grunted as she helped her friend get to her feet, “Uuf, I don’t wish to be rude Ahsoka but you may want to lay off the…” she started but fell silent as Ahsoka’s belly came into view like a rising moon. “What happened to you?”
“Well…” said Ahsoka hesitantly, but she had tell Barriss now, and so she told Barriss about the mission and the holocron and how her belly started growing. It was a brief version of events but covered all the important details.

“And now Anakin has gone off to fetch the council and bring them to examine me,” finished Ahsoka in a distraught voice.
“Something tells me you don’t want that,” said Barriss.
“I don’t,” moaned Ahsoka before she could stop herself, “I mean I…”
“You obviously have been through a lot,” said Barriss in an kind voice, “the council shouldn’t put you through anymore stress if you don’t want to.”
“You know they won’t do that, they’ll say ‘it’s for the good of the galaxy’ or something like that,” said Ahsoka before hopelessly saying, “To be honest I wish I could just run away and hide.”
“Why don’t you?” asked Barriss, “It’s not like there is anyone here to stop you.”
Ahsoka was taken aback, “I can’t just go out into the galaxy like this on my own.”
“You have a ship here, besides you won’t be alone I’ll join you,” said Barriss.

Suddenly the was a sense of anticipation in the air as it became apparent they could just fly away.
“But where?” moaned Ahsoka, realising her plan to just run away and hide wasn’t as easy as Barriss made it seem, “If any Republic official see us they’ll report it to the Jedi Council and even if we could get into a Separatist system Count Dooku and Ventress are also probably interested in getting their hands on this,” she finished giving her belly a prod causing it to wobble for a bit.
“How about Hutt space then?” suggested Barriss her gazed transfixed on Ahsoka’s quivering gut, “it’s neutral but still accessible.”
“Ok then let’s go,” said Ahsoka.
“I’ll just go grab a few things…” began Barriss heading towards the ramp.
“There isn’t enough time Anakin will be back any minute now.
The excitement was back and was consuming both of them, Barriss crossed to the controls and started to initiate a take off without bothering to sit down.
As the ship rose above the city skyline Ahsoka found herself holding her breath expecting at anytime they would receive a message from the council demanding they return or for another ship to start pursuing them, but neither happen instead they were able to clear the planet’s atmosphere and make the jump to lightspeed without a single interruption.

Once the shuttle had entered hyperspace the reality of what they just done begin to creep over them. They had left the temple against the council’s wishes, possibly having them abandon the order by doing so, in a shuttle which was not theirs, to what was probably the most lawless region of the galaxy with no supplies other than what meager supplies were on said shuttle; it seemed crazy. Despite the paranoia that drove Ahsoka to such a thing she still felt wary. She assumed that Barriss, who didn’t have a large belly influencing her to, must be feeling even more apprehensive. Ahsoka sat down heavily in one of the shuttle’s chairs and tried to adjust her robes to cover as much of her belly as possible as Barriss sat in the chair next to her.

There was a pressing awkward silence for a few seconds (even the faint whispering that eminated from Ahsoka’s stomach seemed to have stopped) before Barriss turned her chair to face Ahsoka’s and said “Soooo…”
“Soooo…” replied Ahsoka giving a nervous grin which Barriss responded to with one of her own, then the awkward silence enveloped them once again.

After another awkward silence Barriss started once again, “Sooooo that’s really real?” she asked nodding towards Ahsoka’s bulging abdomen.
“Sure feels like it,” said Ahsoka giving another nervous grin and lightly pat.
“It’s so strange,” said Barriss before the awkward silence could return.
“Tell me about it,” replied Ahsoka.

Then there more awkward silence before Barriss blurted out, “can I feel it?” before immediately tearing her gaze away from Ahsoka and blushing, “I mean, if that’s ok with you?” she finished hesitantly.
Ahsoka didn’t feel the same fear she had at the idea of the council examining her; Barriss was her friend and just as confused by what going on as her. Besides another part of her body, the hormones flowing around her distended frame, was sending other feelings to her mind, the desire for contact, closeness, and other feelings which she sure the jedi forbid, that made her say, “Yes!” much faster and louder than she intended, “I mean, if you want to,” she said with a shy grin, while blushing.

Ahsoka pulled back the robe and offered up the orange sphere that was her belly, which by now had swollen even larger making her appear overdue. Barriss couldn’t hide her eagerness as the leaned forward her eyes transfixed on her friend’s rotund middle. She first stretched out a hand shaking with hesitation and gave a light poke to Ahsoka’s stomach immediately withdrawing her hand as though she expected Ahsoka’s belly to pop with a loud ‘bang’. All that happen was Ahsoka’s belly swayed slightly, Barriss looked at Ahsoka and gave sheepish laugh while still blushing, and was answered by a nervous grin before Barriss gently put both her hands on Ahsoka’s belly.
As Barriss caressed her fingers across the orange dome, that was her friend’s belly, Ahsoka was overcome by a sensation of peaceful bliss she had not felt since receiving her ‘gift’ and even then never felt as strong before. Barriss in turn started off nervous but as she continued to rub Ahsoka’s middle she started to fall into her own sea of calmness as she became transfixed by the rhythmic rise and fall of Ahsoka’s belly as her friend breathed in and out.
When Barriss’s hand lightly clipped the nub of Ahsoka’s protruding belly button, Ahsoka’s whole body gave a shuddered and she made a faint noise but neither broke from their reverie. After a while Ahsoka’s hands joined Barriss’s in rubbing the swollen orb, Ahsoka vaguely marvelling at how small and dainty their hands looked in relation to her engorged middle.

This continued for quite awhile both loosing track of the time as they sat there in complete silence except for the faint whispering (which had started again) and the occasional soft noise by Ahsoka as one of them brushed around her sensitive navel. As they sat there gazing either at the pulsating orb of Ahsoka’s belly or into each other’s eyes they were interrupted by a loud groan and rumble from Ahsoka’s belly. Since both had their hands on Ahsoka’s stomach at the time they felt the vibrations emanating from deep within Ahsoka’s body, and with that the spell of peaceful bliss was broken. With that the awkward silence rushed back in, where they been gazing at each other before they now nervously eyed one another neither wanting to be the one to address what they had been doing even though they remained in place, their hands frozen in place on the surface of the orb of ahsoka’s belly as though they had been caught doing something they were forbidden from doing.

It was Ahsoka who broke the silence by saying with a nervous laugh, “Sooo, is there any food on this shuttle?”
“I’ll check!” said Barriss quickly and leaping up, desperate not to confront what the two of them had been doing.

While Barriss poked around the ship for ration packs the ship exited hyperspace into…

13211112111212112.content:
Ahsoka felt the change in speed as the ship left hyperspace, Barriss must have also felt it as she stopped searching the shuttle’s stores and crossed to the controls.
“Where are we?” asked Ahsoka struggling to get to her feet.
“We’re at Sleheyron,” said Barriss aiding her gravid looking friend to her feet, “It’s a ‘humph’ hutt world,” she said heaving Ahsoka up.
“Sleheyron, where have I heard that name before?” said Ahsoka, placing a hand on the side of her swollen middle to steady it.
Barriss looked hesitant as she said “…it’s the world that…”
“Come on spit it out,” said Ahsoka.
“It’s the world that Ziro the Hutt came from.”
Ahsoka suddenly began to panic, “We can’t go there, what if someone recognises us and wants revenge?”
“Don’t worry,” said Barriss soothingly as she took the opportunity to gently rub Ahsoka’s bulging stomach, “Ziro’s dead by his own kind, he was not really that popular, even for a hutt,” she said before continuing. “Besides, I doubt someone would really recognise you at the moment you…”
“are more likely to pass for a hutt than a padawn,” finished Ahsoka.
“I wasn’t going to say that,” said Barriss but a beeping and flashing light on the controls interrupted her. “It seems to a traffic controller,” said Bariss looking at a display, “let me do the talking,” she continued and flipped the switch.

“Oom-public shuttle, oeclare uta-sha purpose wata (Republic shuttle, declare your purpose here),” said a harsh voice from the speaker in Huttese.
“Jee-jee oom-fugees nleeing bu nighting nop andar 4, jee-jee baja sanctuaree nop uta-sha soocha (We are refugees fleeing the fighting on antar 4, we seek sanctuary on your planet),” replied Barriss.
There was a slight pause before the voice on the radio replied, “Beke uta-sha oom-fugees then whee uba official oom-public militaree vessel (If your are refugees then why are you in an official republic military vessel)?”
A terrible thought occurred to Ahsoka as Barriss replied, “Lo sash bu oop waee escape, let land an jee-jee seel explain uba (It was the only way for us to escape, let us land and we can explain to you).”
There was another pause longer than the last before the voice on the radio said, “Proceed landing oolatform BX-2G114, pa custom official widd sajo uba, bal not attempt land anywhere else or uba widd shulu nire upon (Proceed to landing platform BX-2G114, where a custom official will meet you, do not attempt to land anywhere else or you will be fire upon!)”

Barriss pushed a button that let the shuttle fly itself to the way point given to it, and the shuttle zoomed towards the basalt surface of the smoke covered industrial planet.
“Do you have a plan for what to say when we land?” asked Ahsoka.
“I was just saying that to buy us time I was just going to repeat what I said before maybe with some more details,” replied Barriss.
“There are going to recognise us as jedi the moment they see use,” said Ahsoka voicing her fear that she had earlier.
Barriss faced went pale as Ahsoka said this, then flushed with colour as she had an idea if we hide the robes and lightsabres in the shuttle they have nothing to identify us by,” said Barriss taking off her robe and hiding it behind some mechanical supplies in one of the storage compartments.
Ahoska hesitated, she didn’t like discarding her lightsabre but given just how large her belly was she would not be able to hit anyone in front of without slicing her own belly off (something that she wished she could do but as the dull throbbing from inside it told her, the belly as all Ahsoka and cutting it off was something that would be immensely painful and most likely lead to her death). She also didn’t like discarding her robes either, even though they didn’t cover it entirely Ahoska felt conscious at just how big her changing body had become, particularly her belly; without robes all she would be wearing was a tube top that now represent more of a bra as it retreated from trying to cover her massive belly to try and focus on containing her growing breasts, a short skirt made all the more shorter her growing rump of a behind, her tights who decorative cut outs now seemed like a structural liability, all of with seemed increasingly way too small for her, as well as her boots the only part of her outfit she was currently happy with. Barriss got off much easier without her robes she still had a skin tight jumpsuit that covered most of her body and a long skirt over the lower half, and most significantly unlike Ahsoka Barriss did not have a massive belly that made her look pregnant with triplets. Despite all this though Ahsoka still hid her jedi possessions along side of Barriss.

The two of them stood there, in silence as the shuttle began to descend letting them know that they were landing.
Not long after they landed a Duros flanked by four armed guards walked up to shuttle, Barriss pushed a button to let the ramp down.
“Please step out of the ship,” said the Duros in basic.
Ahsoka looked at Barriss, who gave shrug and the two exited the shuttle.
Barriss exited the ship first and paused half way down the ramp to help Ahsoka down, who was gingerly waddling behind her trying not to let the slope of the ramp or the weight of her stomach pull her forward.
Ahsoka was more worried about the reaction of other people seeing her this big, and while she could not see any reaction the duros face one of the guards nudge another and pointed at Ahsoka’s swollen middle, as though there was some way he missed it.

“I am this spacesport’s customs official,” said the duros in a nasally voice, “I hear to inspect the contents of your ship, do you have a manifesto?”
“No,” said Barriss “we just used it to get away from the fighting.”
“On Anat 4?” Questioned the official.
“Yes,” said Barriss and Ahsoka in unison.
“hmm,” said the duros tapping on his data pad, “I will now inspect the content of your ship please remain out here unless I call for you, if you try to run away you will be shot.”
“Like I can do that,” muttered Ahsoka.
The duros gave another, ‘hmm’ before up the ramp onto the ship.

There was a few minutes where the pair wait outside with the guards in complete silence with only the noise of the settlement around them and faint whispering from within Ahsoka. She was afraid that the guards might hear the whispering from her swollen gut and get suspicious, but either they couldn’t her it or gave no attention to it.

After 10-15 minutes, which felt like an eternity to Ahsoka the Duros exited the ship, “have you seen what you needed to,” asked Ahsoka testily she for some reason was grumpy despite her fear.

“Yes I believe I have,” said the official in a matter of fact tone while tapping a few more times on is data pad, “guards I want you to arrest this pair.”
“What!? What for?” blurted out Barriss.
“For stealing,” said the Duros as the guard moved towards the pair of jedi one getting a couple of binders ready.
“We told you already tha…” began Barriss.
“Yes, that you were fleeing the fighting from Antar 4, though the navi-computer aboard the shuttle shows that you clearly came from Coruscant. Ahsoka’s heart sank as realised just how much they were caught out. “What I reckoned happened was that you two are some entertainment workers from Courscant, possibly table dances or something,” said the Duros.
“Hey!” said Ahsoka objecting at the accusation.
The official continued, “then one day you found yourself in desperate need for some money fast, possibly because you,” he gestured to Ahsoka, “got yourself knocked up by half the lower levels by looks of it.” Ahsoka gritted her teeth. “So you two decided to steal a Republic Shuttle and sell it for cash, after all it would probably fetch quite a price either from smugglers or the separatists, both of which could do with one, may you have planned the idea in advance or maybe you just saw an opportunity one day and took it. Then you decided to come here because you think we have no laws in hutt space, well let me tell you ladies, that we do have laws they just happened to be our laws. You thought being criminals would be easy, clearly you had not done anything like this before as you would stripped the ship down and erased the navi-computer. Instead you don’t and leave these to be found instead.”
The duros unfolded a bundle of cloth underneath one of his arms, revealing it to be Ahsoka’s and Barriss’ robes with their lightsabres. “It’s probably best that we caught you first,” said the official, “the jedi are said to take these things quite seriously,” he finished before asking, “So tell me, how close am I?”
13211112111212112.title: Another system

132111121112121122.content:
Barriss seeing an opportunity, went along with his assumptions and put on a desperate act. Please kind sir, have mercy, my friend just seeks a place to start a new life. Barriss motioned to Ahsoka, who was annoyed at being pulled into this pathetic charade.

“If that is the case, perhaps we could sell this ship for you, for a sizable cut.” The official said with a sinister smirk. Barriss looked at him aghast that her plan was falling apart. “W…we actually need that ship.” Barriss stammered, Ahsoka huffed in frustration. “Come on Barriss.” Ahsoka groaned. Ahsoka waved her hands and used the Jedi mind trick. “You checked our ship and found nothing of interest, now give us our stuff back and forget you ever saw us.” Ahsoka commanded dismissively, but to her and Barriss’ surprise everyone in the area froze in place apparently affected, more than a dozen goons.

As the girls walked away from the scene Barriss looked at Ahsoka worriedly. “Ahsoka I didn’t know you could do that?” Ahsoka defensively replied. “I didn’t, I was just trying to use the mind trick on that annoying customs office, I didn’t mean to mind trick everyone there but hey, at least we got to keep our stuff.” She said lifting up and showing off her ill-fitting robe. Barriss glanced at Ahsoka’s triplet sized belly worriedly and asked. “Do you suppose this has something to do with what is happening to you.” “Isn’t it Obvious, but it sure helped us out back there.” Ahsoka said trying to reassure Barriss. “Your control of the force has gotten unnaturally strong, what if there are unforeseen repercussions.” Ahsoka looked fearfully at Barriss and nervously asked. “Like what?” Both girls stopped as Ahsoka’s stomach ominously gurgled. They glanced down together and watched in stunned fascination as Ahsoka’s Swollen middle suddenly inflated larger. Growing a few inches larger and making Ahsoka look very overdue with triplets. “What just happened, I blew up like a balloon.” Ahsoka squeaked as she explored her newly enlarged gut. “You’ve been growing, Ahsoka.” Barriss explained in frustration, as she ushered Ahsoka into a place less crowded for their conversation. “No, I’ve been growing slowly!” Ahsoka corrected as they ducked into an alcove. “I’ve never grown that fast, Oh, what am I going to do.” Barriss watched Ahsoka pace about distraughtly. “I fear that using the force hastens your growth.” Barriss warned. “I think you should refrain from using the force until we figure this out… and that you need some new clothes.” Barriss said with a worried smile. Ahsoka looked down noting several inches of belly protruding embarrassingly from her robe. “I guess I do.” Ahsoka sighed defeatedly.

Ahsoka settled on an assemble similar to her older one obviously larger and with a voluminous maternity top, with a short jacked, and a larger robe. “Well, this should do nicely.” Barriss said reassuringly. “Yeah, until I grow out of it.” Ahsoka countered despairingly. “Ahsoka you mustn’t let those feelings get to you, you’re stronger than that.” Barriss implored, Ahsoka smiled weakly at her friend’s faith, feeling slightly better. They checked into an inn and decided to settle down for the night. Ahsoka collapsed on the bed with a frustrated snarl. “I don’t know what I’m doing Barriss, I’m trying to run away, but I can’t run from this.” Ahsoka moaned as she rubbed her stomach. Barriss sat beside her and contemplated their current options. “Well, the only ones that might be able to help us are the Jedi council.” Barriss said matter of factually. “Are you serious, it was your idea to come here instead.” Barriss was flabbergasted by Ahsoka’s response, and nervously explained. “Well you said you didn’t want to deal with them.” “So that’s the last thing I’d want to do.” Ahsoka explained with a huff, and she started rubbing her belly. Barriss watched her regretfully and reluctantly reached out to help her. “Thanks, Barriss.” Ahsoka moaned as she enjoyed her friends gentle touch. As she eased her friend, Barriss couldn’t help but marvel at Ahsoka’s swollen size. “Goodness Ahsoka I can’t believe how big you have gotten.” “Yeah, I guess it is surprising.” Ahsoka replied nervously, confused as to how to take the comment. “I mean you were always so thin; I can hardly believe you could get so large.” “Well I am.” Ahsoka growled starting to feel more insulted. Barriss noticed Ahsoka’s irritation and clarified. “No, I mean you are miraculously gravid Ahsoka and I wouldn’t think you could get any larger and yet, I fear you will. Barriss looked at Ahsoka fearfully, Ahsoka looked down at herself her stomach having grown about an inch larger throughout the rest of the day, making her look like she was going beyond triplets, Barriss rested her hand on the crest of Ahsoka’s maternal swell. “Surely you can’t keep growing like this.” Ahsoka nervously replied. “Surely I will not.” She turned away from her friend and settled into the bed. Ahsoka hoped to end the conversation and despite what she said, deep down she feared it was not true, and that she would keep growing. Barriss took the hint and settled in as well, and the girls drifted off into sleep.


Ahsoka dreamed she was lying in a field looking to the stars and thin as she once was. Barriss called to her and Ahsoka looked toward her. However suddenly Barriss disappeared in a blue wisp, and Ahsoka’s stomach gurgled. Ahsoka was confused as to what just happened and looked around for her friend only to find their ship looming over her. It too disappeared and Ahsoka felt full. “What is happening.” She cried and stumble to her feet and as she did so she found herself towering over the city. As Ahsoka looked down at the town the buildings began to disappear as well. One by one they vanished and as they did Ahsoka felt a strange sensation in her still flat stomach. Ahsoka had closed her eyes from the pain she felt, and soon she no longer felt the ground beneath her feet. She opened her eyes to find herself floating in space, she was the size of a planet the star dust and galaxies swirled around her head. Ahsoka was entranced for a brief moment when she felt something. Looking into the distance she saw many stars disappear and a familiar fullness growing inside her. She had grown again now she dwarfed the celestial bodies and she had begun to understand. Inside her she felt a massive power, she felt like the force itself, no the whole universe itself was inside her, immense and ever expanding. She realized...
