Barriss looked at Ahsoka despairingly, Ahsoka was lying on her back. There was a mountainous bulge in the sheets which Barriss knew was Ahsoka’s stomach. It towered ominously over the svelte padowan, the crest shockingly approaching Barriss’ eyeline. She gently pulled back the sheets and uncovered Ahsoka’s orange mound. It was a stunning sight, Ahsoka’s orange stomach was firm and looked like she had swallowed a large coastal play spheroid. It had even started rounding her sides. Barriss was fascinated by her friend’s swollen middle and she felt strangely drawn to it. She hesitantly reached out to caress it but was stopped when Ahsoka unexpectedly spoke up. “I know I’m huge.” Ahsoka said, Barriss quickly recoiled her hand in surprise. “Ahsoka! I didn’t know you were awake.” Barriss stammered trying to hide her embarrassment at being caught trying to feel Ahsoka’s belly. "I think I know what is happening.” Ahsoka explained which got her friend’s attention.

Ahsoka and Barriss where sitting across from each other on the bed facing each other. “The spirits that were sealed in the holochron are like conduits to the force itself. The holochron was meant to contain them and impede their connection to the force. When needed the Jedi could connect them to the force and channel their endless power to enhance their own. “That is horrible, those poor souls were trapped for eons to be used in such a way. Barriss was appalled, such a fate was worse than death, to be cut off from the force itself. Her confusion showed on her face as she processed what Ahsoka had revealed, she focused on Ahsoka again and asked. “Was that the work of the Jedi.” “I don’t know.” Ahsoka replied before she moaned in discomfort, obviously feeling uncomfortable. “But that is not all.” Ahsoka continued ignoring the uncomfortable feeling she was experiencing. “Now that they are free of the holochron they can channel the limitless power of the force into their new vessel which just so happens to be me.” It quickly dawned on Barriss. “That is why you have gotten so powerful!” She cried, Ahsoka nodded in agreement. “It is also probably why my growth hasn’t impeded my mobility at all.” Ahsoka added, Barriss slowly realizing how it was strange Ahsoka could move around easily despite her inflated form. “That’s not the worse part.” Ahsoka said regaining Barriss’ attention. “Unlike their previous vessel, I am a living being, and absorbing all of this force energy is actually affecting my body, I’m like a balloon slowly being fill with all the water in the universe.” Ahsoka accentuated this statement by leaning back and drawing Barriss’ attention to her now uncomfortably tight pants. At that very moment Ahsoka’s pants popped open unable to contain her growing gut and further emphasizing her point. “Ahsoka those fit just yesterday.” Barriss exclaimed in a panicked tone. “Yes, and unless we can find a new vessel to contain these spirits I will keep growing endlessly.” Barriss stared in disbelief, the severity of Ahsoka’s situation slowly sinking in. “Ahsoka, what if we remove the spirits will you shrink down or will you stay…” Barriss looked at Ahsoka’s middle anxiously. “I’d rather focus on getting these spirits out of me so I’ll stop growing, we can worry about anything else after.” Barriss nodded in agreement. “So, where shall we find a new vessel?”
1321111211121211223.title: The secret of the Spirits.

13211112111212112233.content:
Looking for a new vessel, the girls flew to a nearby planet know for illegal smuggling. “Are you sure about this? Barriss asked Ahsoka. “No, not really but what other option do we have.” Ahsoka said reclining in her seat. “We could see if the Jedi repaired the holochron.” Barriss said with a weak chuckle. Ahsoka just glared at her in disapproval. “Alright, I’ll go meet this contact of yours, how did you learn about him.” Barriss asked. “I know a Hutt.” Ahsoka replied with a smirk.

The landed near the facility and Barriss made her way to the main building. Asking around she was led deep into the basement of the facility where she met the contact. A rodian smuggler with a collection of rare relics some created by the Jedi from eons past. He had an ancient relic a device that was said to be a source of power in an old Jedi stronghold, but has long since stopped functioning. If it was some sort of Jedi battery perhaps it could contain the power of the spirits. After she purchased the device Barriss quickly left the facility, she couldn’t help worrying about the device. It didn’t look to be in good condition but that is hardly surprise, would this even work, it was very risky and expensive. As she finally exited the building, a strong force shook the area. Immediately Barriss knew that something happened with Ahsoka and she rushed back to the ship.

Shortly before that Ahsoka was waiting in the ship rubbing her belly, it eased the stretched skin of her stomach. She didn’t want to admit how good it felt, her stomach was becoming increasingly more sensitive and any touch brought a blush to her cheeks. She eventually got impatient and headed out to see if she could find Barriss. Ahsoka looked around nervously waiting for Barriss to return, she tried to stay out of sight to not draw any unwanted attention. Unfortunately for her, Ahsoka’s efforts to be inconspicuous made her seem suspicious and as she turned to go back in the ship someone stopped her. “Hey you, what cha got there!” Cried a lasat thug that noticed her suspicious secretive behavior. “I’m sorry?” Ahsoka asked as the lasat approached her menacingly. “What cha hiding under that robe, it looks awful big, you think I wouldn’t notice you got something under there.” Ahsoka didn’t know how to respond to the brute’s accusations and could tell she was in trouble. “I… I don’t have anything.” The lasat thug grabbed hold of her collar and pulled off her hood. “Ain’t got nothing under there, how stupid do you think I am, are you trying to make off with our merchandise you little thief.” He forced her robe open and stopped in his tracks, Ahsoka massive maternal bulge leaving him completely dumbfounded. “Wha is this!” he cried, Ahsoka losing control unconsciously pushed the thug away with the force, but her immense power sent a shockwave out in front of her. The guard flew clear over the building, Shipping contains were hurled away, ships were jostled breaking their landing gear, the whole area trembled. Ahsoka could tell she messed up as she felt a great power growing within her, she hurried back to the ship.

Barriss sprinted into the ship to find a straining Ahsoka leaning on the hull. “Ahsoka are you okay, what happened.” She cried going to her friend’s side. “I’m sorry Barriss I lost control and accidentally used the force.” She huffed out, exhausted she stopped resisting the power welling up inside her. Ahsoka groaned as her stomach started inflating, she quickly gained five inches on her waistline as her stomach started to resemble a mother overdue with quadruplets quickly approaching quintuplets. Her chest and butt grew slightly but not as much as her enlarged middle. Her still svelte limbs and face made her massive orange belly seem even more disproportionate. Barriss just stared in horror as if fearing her friend would explode like bomb. “Ahsoka you’re huge!” Barriss gasped, Ahsoka reached out for support and Barriss obliged helping her to the ship’s bench. “I’m trying to contain it, and the power just keeps growing.” Ahsoka says as she lays down. Barriss starts helping Ahsoka rub her belly causing her to sigh in satisfaction. “Is it exhausting?” Barriss asks in concern. “It’s like trying to hold back a sneeze, I want to just let go, but I’m afraid I would outgrow this ship in an instant.” Ahsoka explained, Barriss pulled out the device. “Well, hopefully this can help you.”
13211112111212112233.title: continue.

132111121112121122333.content:
Out in the middle of space the girls set their plan in motion. Ahsoka had been analyzing the device, using her augmented connection to the force to understand it better. Barriss watched in fascination as Ahsoka studied the device on a spiritual level. “Well do you think it will work?” Barriss finally asked, eliciting a response from Ahsoka. “It might.” Ahsoka said with a determine look. “It might? Is that good enough?” Barriss asked, Ahsoka just go up and placed the device on the floor of the ship. “Well, It’s not like we have any other options.” She said matter of factually as she too a seat on the floor nearby. Barriss sat down across from her the device sitting between them.

They both started meditating, Ahsoka put her hands on the device and Barriss put her hands on Ahsoka’s. They both started concentrating and focused on the device. A powerful pressure consumed the ship as Ahsoka tried to channel the spirits into the device. Barriss helped control the power Ahsoka was emitting, but as she was concentrating, she became distracted glancing at Ahsoka’s smooth inflated middle. “Barriss stay focused.” Ahsoka barked, sweat appeared on her brow as she struggled to maintain control. Barriss quickly regained focus, but noticed she was starting to feel overwhelmed. “Ahsoka, I something wrong.” She asked, and looked to Ahsoka for guidance. “It’s too much, It won’t work.” Ahsoka whimpered, Barriss looked and noticed Ahsoka’s belly had visibly shrunk, having deflated to quadruplet size. “What are you talking about It’s working.” Barriss said, but as she looked at Ahsoka’s face she saw her, strain and frustration. “You don’t understand we have barely made a dent in their numbers and this thing is already full.” Barriss looked down at the device and noticed it glowed with an intense light. “I’m sorry Barriss.” Ahsoka said, Barriss felt an immense swell of power consume her before the girls were sent flying into the opposite walls of the ship.
Ahsoka groaned in pain as her stomach inflated once more. She was smaller but it was by a barely noticeable amount, her stomach shrinking four inches in size. Barriss stumbled to her feet and went over to Ahsoka. “It worked Ahsoka, you got smaller, I felt the spirits leave.” She said enthusiastically before a strange feeling overcame her. “Barriss?” Ahsoka asked wondering what was wrong. An ominous gurgle from Barriss’ stomach revealed the answer her stomach swelling up like she was rapidly eating a huge meal. “Ahsoka?” Barriss whimpered, looking down at her new bulging waistline.

Ahsoka was beside herself. “What have I done!” She cried as she paced around the ship. Barriss watched the whole event in annoyance. “Perhaps now we should seek the help of the council.” Barriss said trying to get Ahsoka to focus again. “I guess we don’t have much of an option.” Ahsoka sigh defeatedly, noting her friend’s apprehension Barriss added. “Perhaps after we get some rest.” Ahsoka nodded in agreement and the girls retired to their quarters.

Ahsoka felt awful, her eagerness to exorcise the spirits caused her to be reckless, and Barriss was punished for it. Now if they didn’t find a way to exorcise these spirits soon both her and Barriss will become blimps. Though it was not without any reward as the power welling up inside her was nowhere near as strong. At least she might be able to control it better for now. She focused her mind as she drifted of into a deep sleep.

Barriss rubbed her middle feeling a strange sense of peace, like this was something she always wanted, but didn’t know it. She felt exhilarated and full of energy. She drifted off to sleep in a blissful slumber.
132111121112121122333.title: Shared Spirits

1321111211121211223331.content:
On Coruscant in the Jedi council chamber Anakin entered to find Master Yoda’s waiting for him alone. “Found your padowan yet, you have not.” Master Yoda calmly said, Anakin frowned in humility. “No Master Yoda, I don’t know where she could have gone.” Yoda turned to face him. “Find her quickly, we must. I sense a disturbance in the force, an uncontrollable power, unleashed she has.” Yoda looked off in the distance in contemplation. “Master Skywalker, why did your padowan flee.” Yoda asked looking to Anakin for his opinion. Anakin thought for a moment and replied. “I think she was afraid about what the Jedi council would do about her situation and perhaps what everyone else would think of her condition.” Anakin was careful with his words trying not to reveal Ahsoka’s embarrassing state to Master Yoda. “Fear leads to foolishness, and foolishness leads to regret.” Anakin agreed with a nod. “And what of this condition.” Yoda pried causing Anakin to blush. “I would rather not comment sir.” Anakin stated confidently, Yoda nodded. “Respectable choice Master Skywalker, to the council bring your padowan, deal with her we can.” Yoda calmly said, Anakin bowed and left the chamber, but felt uneasy about the whole situation. While he didn’t sound angry, Master Yoda’s cryptic choice of words made Anakin wonder what Master Yoda planned to do about Ahsoka.

As Anakin was worrying about Ahsoka a voice suddenly snapped him out of his thoughts. “Master Skywalker.” “Senator Palpatine!” Anakin said caught off guard by the senator’s appearance. “Anakin, I have heard that you and your padowan were sent on some mission for Master Yoda, and that something happened, something with your padowan.” Anakin, sighed in defeat. “Yes, we were sent to get a holocron, Master Yoda said it would give us an advantage against the sith, and it may have affected Ahsoka.” “So, it is a weapon, could it be used for the war?” Palpatine inquired cocking his eyebrow. “I don’t know.” Anakin answered with a shrug. “Anakin, if you would, when you find that padowan of yours, I would like to have a word with her before the Jedi Council. I do not want to lose a potential asset for the war effort because of the Jedi Council’s paranoia.”

“I don’t know sir, it’s not my place.” Anakin said and Palpatine gave a slight nod and put his hand of Anakin’s shoulder. “That is fine Master Skywalker, do what you think is right, I only want to end this war as quickly as possible.” Palpatine left Anakin a sinister smile on his face.

Anakin was entered his personal starship and was about to take off when he noticed that he was receiving a communication. When he saw who it was from, he sighed in frustration. He pressed the button on the console and a blue hologram of his padowan’s face materialized it looked at Anakin and gave him a nervous smile. “Hello, Master.” She said trying to be friendly. “Ahsoka!” He barked at the hologram which flinch at his outburst. “Your still mad aren’t you.” Ahsoka asked meekly, much to Anakin’s annoyance. “No Ahsoka, why would I be mad, my padowan just defied the wishes of the Jedi council by running away like a scared child, endangering herself and potentially the republic, why would I be mad.” Ahsoka glared at Anakin. “Hey, I was worried! If Barriss hadn’t been there…” “Barriss! She put you up to this.” Anakin exclaimed, Ahsoka eyes bulged as she realized her mistake. “Ahsoka!” Barriss cried from the background. “Oops, sorry Barriss.” Ahsoka said her hologram looking off to the side as she focused on her friend. “Hello Master Skywalker.” Barriss said nervously off screen, Ahsoka focused back on Anakin and said. “I’m sorry Master, we thought we could solve my situation ourselves, but we couldn’t and we just made things worse.” Anakin just groaned defeatedly. “Where are you girls, we need to rendezvous so you can explain yourselves, and then we’ll figure out what to do about your condition.” Ahsoka avoided looking at Anakin as she revealed their location. “Don’t be mad Master, but we’re near a planet… iiin Hutt Space.” She said with a grimace anticipating an outburst from Anakin. Anakin just collapsed back into his seat defeated, and sighed. “Send me the coordinates.”

With the coordinates the trio decided to meet up in an abandoned Jedi ruin located near the girls’ location.
1321111211121211223331.title: What's Anakin doing.

choices: He decides to let Palpatine talk with them.
He takes them to Master Yoda
13211112111212112233311.content:
Anakin arrived first his ship jumping through hyperspace to arrive at the destination, he waited in the temple his ship parked on one of the landing pads. The girls arrived shortly after, he watched their ship as it landed and he headed over to meet them. The landing ramp lowered and a figure came down, one that left Anakin speechless. “Hello Master.” Ahsoka said awkwardly, the figure was clad in a familiarly dark cloak but it was obviously not the same one he was expecting. Under the hood he saw the blushing face of his padowan, but beneath her face the cloak billowed out immensely looking completely out of place with the small head above it. “Ahsoka, what is that?” Anakin asked full well knowing and fearing the answer. Ahsoka looked down despairingly and answered. “It’s me Master.” Ahsoka groaned as she revealed herself, her stomach was swollen large making her look heavy with quints perhaps larger. The ridiculously large swell looked even more strange on the still very svelte body of the padowan, its girth looking very out of place.

“Ahsoka what happened to you?” Anakin said in disbelief. “She’s grown Master Skywalker.” Barriss loudly said as she made her way down the ramp. As Anakin turned his attention to Barriss he noticed a change in the young padowan as well. “You too Barriss!” Anakin groaned as he saw the round bulge on Barriss’ middle. She had grown larger too looking to be entering the third trimester if she was actually pregnant. “What happened?” Anakin demanded, Ahsoka just hung her head in shame and replied. “You know how I said I made things worse.”

Ahsoka explained what had happened to Barriss and the nature of their problem, Anakin listened and when they finished their story, he thought about what their next action should be. “So, you’re telling me that until we get the spirits out of you, that the two of you will just keep filling with the power of the force.” “That’s about it, I fear that if not stopped we could even grow to the size of a planet.” Ahsoka said, as Barriss thought about Ahsoka’s words she felt a slight thrill, and her cheeks blushed. “You said that the power of the spirits has greatly increased your power of the force, couldn’t this power be used to win the war.” Anakin thought as he gazed at their bellies, Ahsoka gasped in disgust and replied. “Maybe but we won’t, not only is it wrong to use the spirits in such a way, it comes at a cost.” Ahsoka explained turning away from Anakin in a huff. “Alright, I’ll help you get into the capital quietly, but we need to get those spirits out of you both, perhaps I can arrange for you to meet with Master Yoda, he would surely know what to do.” Ahsoka agreed with a nod. “I guess that would be okay.” “Alright let’s go, I trust you at least checked to make sure no one followed you here.” Ahsoka looked to Barriss and said “Of course we did, right Barriss.” Barriss glanced anxiously between the others. “We did, what were we supposed to do?”

Anakin and Ahsoka both groaned in annoyance. “You never leave Hutt territory without checking to see if you’re being followed Barriss.” Ahsoka cried. “Well excuse me, I don’t routinely enter Hutt territory.” Anakin looked around, sensing the presences around them. “We’ve been here long enough, they’re probably going to ambush us at any mome...” Anakin sensed an attack coming, but before he could even react, he heard his padowan. “Master look out!” Ahsoka cried as she pulled Anakin toward her and out of the path of an incoming laser blast. The motion left Anakin leaning on his padowan’s bulge which brought a blush to both their cheeks. He recoiled in embarrassment but quickly turned his attention to the ambushers. They all took out their lightsabers and prepared for the incoming barrage of blaster fire. “Get back to your ship!” Anakin cried as he went to confront the thieves. The girls slowly backed toward the ship using their lightsabers to reflect the blaster fire back picking off a few of the goons. Anakin used the force to jump toward them and struck some down, drawing the focus of the rest. The girls seizing the opportunity turned to head to the ship but found a few of the thieves had snuck up behind them. “Barriss don’t.” Ahsoka cried, as the thieves drew their weapons Barriss quickly reacted using the force to send them flying off the landing pad. Anakin had finished off the rest of the thieves when he heard Ahsoka’s cry and jumped over to the girls. Ahsoka was supporting Barriss who was hunched over. “What’s going on?” Anakin asked. “She used the force.” Ahsoka explained. “It’s so strong Ahsoka.” Barriss groaned, before their eyes Barriss swelled up like a balloon, her stomach quickly reaching overdue with twins. Barriss had a dreamy exhausted expression on her face, as Anakin felt her midriff experimentally, he came to understand what Ahsoka had said. “So that is the cost of using the spirits’ power.” Ahsoka nodded. “Let’s hurry back to the capital.”

The bordered their ships and set off, Anakin leading the way. Barriss gazed down at her swollen middle with a slight smile. “Are you okay Barriss you grew so much.” Ahsoka asked worried about her friend. “I had expected the power, just not how pleasurable it felt.” Barriss explained her cheeks growing darker. Ahsoka blushed too as she averted her gaze. “I admit I may have let my resistance wane.” Barriss sighed as she resumed piloting the ship. “I probably should have warned you about that, that is why it is so hard to resist.” Ahsoka explained, as she looked longingly out the window, her hand stroking her stomach.

As Anakin prepared the ship to enter hyperspace, he thought of senator Palpatine’s request.
13211112111212112233311.title: They meet again.

132111121112121122333111.content:
When they arrived at Coruscant and with some help from the senator Anakin snuck the girls into the capital where they waited in Anakin’s quarters to meet with Master Yoda. It wasn’t long before Anakin came to get them, and led them down the hall. “I didn’t expect that we would see Master Yoda already.” Ahsoka said, which prompted Anakin to correct her. “Actually, you’re not meeting with Master Yoda yet, the senator wanted to speak with you first.” “Senator, what senator?” Barriss asked confused, Ahsoka groaned. “Senator, you don’t mean senator Palpatine do you.” Anakin looked over his shoulder and replied. “Yes actually, and it is because of him that we could sneak you in so easily.”

Anakin arrived at the senator’s office, Ahsoka was annoyed and Barriss was nervous. Before Anakin could announce their arrival the doors opened senator Palpatine waiting in front of his desk. “Master Skywalker, thank you for accepting my request, and Ms. Tano and Ms. Offee I thank you too, if you would please come in.” The girls entered hesitantly Anakin waited outside as the door closed. “We are honored senator, but now is not the best time.” He walked up to them gazing at the bulges in their cloaks. “I have heard, I take it those are the result of your mission.” The senator said looking at them. “Yes, Barriss got affected too as we failed to fix my condition.” “Interesting if you would allow me.” The senator asked her much to Ahsoka’s embarrassment, she revealed herself the senator obviously surprised. “I had heard but seeing it personally is a little shocking.” Palpatine said, her noticed Ahsoka’s unease and decided to get to the matter. “Now about this state you find yourselves in, it does not hurt does it? He asked inspecting her turgid gut with his eyes. “No sir!” Ahsoka said her cheeks flushing. Noticing her reaction the senator pried further. “Oh, perhaps it is the opposite.” He said with a wry smile that caused both girls to blush even more, ignoring their embarrassment he continued. “I have heard that it grants you strength you have never experienced before. Such strength would be invaluable to the republic it could easily be used to dissuade any support for the seperatists. Imagine a handful of chosen Jedi as strong as any army.” “Senator! with all due respect, we can’t stay like this and it is unacceptable to use the spirits in such a way.” Ahsoka said her and Barriss obviously upset by his suggestion. “I was merely suggesting that we just give a show of force to avoid dragging out this war any longer than it needs to be, prevent any more tragedies.” He explained trying to calm the girls down, their resolve waned and the senator decided to change his approach. “Besides, what do the Jedi intend to do, reseal those spirits leave them trapped forever cut off from the force.” As senator Palpatine said this he gently placed his hands on the girls’ shoulders.” Ahsoka’s and Barriss’s lids grew heavy their focus lost as the senator’s word filled their minds. “I don’t want you to do anything that you wouldn’t want to do, nothing at all right now, I only ask that you not be so eager to reject such a blessed gift, enjoy your selves and keep protecting those poor spirits.” He whispered his subtle influence twisting the girls desires.

Anakin was waiting when the door to the senator’s office opened and he stepped out. “Ah, Master Skywalker it would seem that your friends have changed their minds.” The senator explained to Anakin’s surprise. “What do you mean senator?” Ahsoka and Barriss came out and nodded in agreement. “We can’t let them just reseal these spirits again so they can be used as the Jedi desire.” Ahsoka said with a determined look, Anakin was confused at his padowan’s conviction but didn’t see any reason to doubt it. “So, what do you want to do?” Anakin asked, “we will think of another solution ourselves.” Ahsoka said, prompting Palpatine to speak up. “Perhaps they could lay low for a while, somewhere peaceful, I believe your friend, senator Amidala is returning to Naboo for a while perhaps they could join her.”
132111121112121122333111.title: Meeting with the senator.

1321111211121211223331111.content:
Anakin led his swollen companions through the corridors to the room of his friend Padme trying to be as inconspicuous as possible. As her room came into view Padme was just leaving when she noticed Anakin. “Anakin! What’s going on I received word from senator Palpatine that you wanted to see me?” She asked feeling worried about what was going on, hearing her distress Anakin clarified. “Nothing’s wrong Padme, at least with me but I was wondering if you would do me a favor.” Padme was relieved and told him. “Of course Anakin, what is it.” Anakin glanced back at the girls. “Well I heard you were going back to Naboo, I was wondering if you could let Ahsoka and Barriss accompany you.” Padme seemed a little surprised by Anakin’s request, but she was more surprised from the realization that the large figure behind Anakin was actually Ahsoka. “Ahsoka is that you?” Ahsoka raised her head and smiled anxiously. “Hello senator Amidala.” Returning her attention to Anakin, Padme said. “I would be honored if the young padowans would accompany me.” Anakin was relieved that Padme accepted his request and looked to his friends. “Ahsoka, Barriss you should go with Padme, I’ll see to the council.” They parted ways and Ahsoka and Barriss followed Padme.

On the way to Padme’s ship, Padme decided to break the awkward silence. “Ahsoka, I didn’t recognize you with that disguise.” Ahsoka just stared at her perplexed. “What disguise, I’m just wearing a cloak.” She explained, Padme turned around and faced Ahsoka “Not that, this.” Padme said with a chuckle, giving the large mass under her cloak a pat. “What is it, Its huge.” Padme continued grasping the mass which caused Ahsoka to blush furiously, Barriss watching the incident with perverse interest. “It’s not a disguise, its me!” Ahsoka exclaimed, Padme’s touch leaving her flustered. Padme recoiled in surprise at Ahsoka’s response and as she processed what she said Padme became confused. “What do you mean?” Ahsoka groaned in frustration and then looked around suspiciously, making sure there was no one else in view. When she had determined the coast was clear, she pulled back her cloak showing Padme the massive orange swell of her stomach. Padme looked at Ahsoka’s huge belly in frightful bewilderment, she looked up at Ahsoka’s face and then glanced at Barriss, who also showed off her smaller but still heavily pregnant looking bulge. After recovering from Ahsoka’s surprising reveal, Padme regained her composure and nervously asked. “Ahsoka what happened to you, you look heavy with many children, but I know that is not possible because I saw you just a few weeks ago.”

Covering themselves back up Ahsoka said in irritation. “It’s a long story senator, one that we can discuss it when we get to your ship. They quickly made their way to Padme’s ship and settled into their quarters while the crew handled the ship. Once safely in Padme’s room the girls finally relaxed. Padme faced Ahsoka and said. “Now that we have some privacy, would be so kind as the tell me what happened Ms. Tano.” Padme gasped as she noticed something, which left Ahsoka confused as to what was wrong, until she noticed a draft on her stomach. Her stomach was protruding from her cloak slightly, exposing a sliver of orange flesh. “You’re growing!” Padme gasped.
1321111211121211223331111.title: Padme Amidala

13211112111212112233311111.content:
“Come on, even this tent of a cloak is too small now.” Ahsoka snarled in frustration as she plopped down on one of the seats with a huff. Barriss took the opportunity to change the subject. “Allow me to explain senator Amidala.” Barriss told Padme about what had happened and how she had found herself in this state because of Ahsoka. “So, you will continue to swell.” Padme asked as she stared at Barriss’s middle in strange fascination. “Yes, until we find a way to get the spirits to leave us, which hopefully we will, right Ahsoka.” Barriss said, turning her attention to her friend. She blushed in embarrassment as she saw Ahsoka, who was lounging with her robe open, her large fecund mound on full display. “Perhaps you should cover up Ahsoka, in case one of the crew checks in on us.” Barriss stammered, which prompted Ahsoka to roll her eyes in irritation. “I can’t anymore Barriss and so what, I’m tired of hiding this thing.” Ahsoka said slapping her gut for emphasis, Barriss looked away embarrassed while Padme was intrigued. “So, what does it feel like?” She inquired taking a seat near Ahsoka, Ahsoka contemplated how put it delicately. “It feels like a great fullness, the skin feels tight and is really sensitive, the slightest touch is an overwhelming sensation.” Ahsoka explained her cheeks getting redder, noting Ahsoka’s expression Padme pried further. “Is it a pleasant sensation?” Barriss replied before Ahsoka could. “It is an unpleasantly pleasant sensation.” Barriss exclaimed with a sigh, as she caressed her own stomach sensually. Padme felt a twinge of envy as she stared at the swollen bellies of the young Jedi.

When they arrived at Naboo, Padme helped the girls get settled in, they were given rooms of their own and Padme even offered to get the girls some new clothes. Ahsoka was getting fitted for her new wardrobe with Padme and Barriss. The seamstress had just finished taking her measurements and left the girls alone for a moment. Ahsoka stared at her reflection and was displeased with what she saw, her stomach was huge making her appear heavy with sextuplets, her waist having more than doubled her width, her limbs were still strangely scrawny and her bust and butt had barely grown making the ridiculously large stomach even more out of place. “Goodness Ahsoka, you look stunning.” Padme said taking in Ahsoka’s appearance. “Yes Ahsoka, you’re practically glowing.” Barriss added, Ahsoka was confused by the praise until she looked at her reflection again and noticed the sheen on her skin, the lack of stretch marks or blemishes, she looked simply radiant. As she stared entranced by her own body, she felt something stirring in her heart, she felt a slight sense of pride. When the seamstress returned, she took Barriss measurements and began to make them some clothes. “They’ll need to be very roomy.” Padme clarified to the seamstress who nodded in agreement, their new clothes wouldn’t be finished until tomorrow so Padme bid them farewell and let Ahsoka and Barriss retire for the night.

As the young Jedi headed to their rooms Barriss spoke up. “Ahsoka, have you felt different.” She asked, which caused Ahsoka to think about it. “Well, kind of I’m gigantic, but for some reason I’m not worried about the spirits making us grow.” Ahsoka said as Barriss nodded in agreement. “Me too, I not as big as you obviously, but I’m not worried about it, in fact I might even accept it.” The two Jedi continued to wonder about their strange lack of worry until they got to their rooms. They parted ways and went in their rooms. Barriss looked at her reflection in the bedroom mirror, a lustful desire built inside her as she groped her own maternal swell. She was so lost in fondling herself that she didn’t notice as her control waned. Her turgid bulge which resembled a woman overdue with triplets swell slightly larger and larger. As Barriss came she collapsed on the bed in satisfaction, her stomach having inflated to the size of quadruplets. Meanwhile Ahsoka collapsed on her bed exhausted, she looked down at the massive mound that towered over her. “Argh, I’m a blimp!” Ahsoka growled in frustration, she slipped deep into slumber, her thoughts filled with doubts.
13211112111212112233311111.title: To Naboo

choices: Anakin brought food for Ahsoka & Barriss.  It wasn't enough.  They want more.
Anakin brought foos for Ahsoka & Barriss.  It was enough.  They want new cloth.
Anakin brought food but found Ahsoka & Barriss sleeping next to each other.
132111121112121122333112.content:
Anakin thought for a moment what Yoda said. “Fear leads to foolishness, and foolishness leads to regret." For a moment it made sense. 15322112112.content:
The figure grunted as they struggled to reach into a small compartment, eventually grasping what they had aimed for. They pulled it out, inspected it, and placed it in their pack. They jumped off of the short ledge they were on and rappelled carefully down towards the ground. As the figure touched the ground they placed a hand gently on their midriff, which was swollen with child. She walked out from the wreckage of the star destroyer, pulling off her mask when she got out. Her hands both fell to her large, 8 month pregnant belly, before she grabbed her water cannister and drank the last of its contents.
Rey slid down a sandbank, towards her speeder, which she then loaded up with the scrap she had found. She carefully clambered on, wary of her enlarged middle, and sped away towards nima outpost, to sell her scrap.
When she arrived she grabbed her salvage and dragged it towards a small, sheltered stand with a queue stood outside of it. When she got to the front, she presented her wares to the alien in the stand.
“What you’ve brought me today is worth... one quarter portion” he said, grumpily.
“One quarter?” Rey asked desperately.”please, i have a baby on the way”
“I said one quarter portion” the alien said, before shooing her away.
She headed towards her speeder, and in turn towards home. She cooked her meal, which was barely enough for her and her baby, and sat outside, her hands exploring her gravid sphere. She parted her robes to reveal her bump, blemish free. Her pale skin was stretched tight as she ran her hands over it, savouring the peaceful feeling. Her belly button was stretched out on the front of her belly, and she absentmindedly played with it as she massaged, causing her to shiver a little. She didn’t know how she got pregnant, just that she was and that she was due soon.

153221121121.content:
She Was still sat outside her makeshift home, playing with an hold helmet when she heard beeping. That wasn’t out of the ordinary . What was unordinary was how they sounded, like a cry for help. She pushed herself up and readjusted her robes, walking over to her staff and ‘running’ towards the source if the sound.
When she got over the ridge she saw Teedo, another loca, struggling against a droid in a net. She rushed over and said something to Teedo, challenging him. As he responded, she knelt down carefully and began cutting the droid free. After a brief exchange of challenges and rude phrases (mostly from Teedo) the droid was finally free. It was a white and orange BB unit. She knelt down to talk ro it.
“ That's just Teedo. Wants you for parts. He has no respect for anyone.” She said, glaring at teedo as he left, mumbling “Your antenna's bent.”
She pulled off its antenna to fix it as it beeped in response.
“Where do you come from?” She asked.
The droid beeped in response.
“ Classified. Really? Me too. Big secret.” She replied, playing along with the droid.
The droid beeped at her questioningly.
“Yes I am pregnant” she said, noticing that she had been absent-mindedly rubbing it.
The droid beeped again.
“You want to come with me? No no, you want to head to Nima outpost” she said, pointing towards it”
The droid chirped sadly.
“Oh alright then, follow me” she sighed, feeling bad for the droid.”but in the morning, you go”
The droid said something along the lines of ‘your welcome’ as they headed towards her home.

1532211211211.content:
That night Rey was sat, alone, outside her home. BB-8, the droid, had powered down for the night and was inside, safe from any scavengers who might want to steal him for parts.
Rey looked up at the night sky, watching the stars twinkle and watching the occasional ship take off or leave Niima outpost. She thought back to her own family, who had left her on Jakku for whatever reason all those years ago. Her hands rubbed her belly comfortingly, as if she was reassuring herself that she at least had someone with her.
“At least you won’t be alone” she whispered to her belly.
She lifted her robes to reveal her bare belly. Her skin was shining slightly from the faint moonlight. She rubbed her hands in slow circles, massaging her tight skin. Her hands felt soft on her belly. She continued to rub her bump, until she felt her baby kick, feeling it move across her belly. She rubbed the spot gently, feeling another kick, this one a little harder, distorting her belly a little. She moved her hands to her underbelly, cradling it gently, feeling her baby give the occasional kick. She was peaceful for that short moment, just her and her baby.
1532211211211.title: That night

15322112112112.content:
Suddenly Rey Felt a cool breeze blowing over her as she sat outside, holding her belly. The wind felt relaxing and made her feel cozy and safe, and almost as if she was floating. Her Belly felt warm and she began to get the impulse to rub it, more fervently than she had been before. Her hands caressed every inch of it, the feeling pleasurable and enjoyable. She rubbed more vigorously and felt her belly move. It wasn’t a kick, or if it was it didn’t feel like one. Then she felt it again. It definitely wasn’t a kick. She opened her eyes and looked down at her belly. Her belly, already quite large was expanding slowly, inflating like a balloon. She couldn’t stop her hands from rubbing, as if she was being controlled by some unknown force, but she felt her belly growing tighter under her palms. Her belly kept growing gently for a time, until it stopped, looking much, much bigger than it had before.
“What.. was... that?” She said, out of breath.
She inspected her belly curiously. Ir still remained stretch mark free but her skin felt much tighter than before. She poked it lightly and felt that there wasn’t much give to it anymore. She ran a hand over her belly button and felt that it was completely flat, rather than the tiny dimple it had been. She felt a kick, which assured her that her baby was ok, but then she felt another, following quite quickly after the first. Then again, and again. Then she realised what had happened. She wasn’t pregnant with just one baby anymore. She was having Twins now.

Rey Tried to stand up, to no avail, so she tried again, and again. Eventually she heaved her gravid body off of the bed, stumbling as she tried to find her balance, not being used to the very heavy weight on her front. She cradled it as she slowly ambled to the door, but she stopped just before she got to it.
“I can’t go around like this!” She whispered to herself, gesturing to her bared belly.
She waddled to her dwardrobe and looked for something more appropriate to wear. If she was honest, there wasn’t a lot, most of it was either dirty, or something old that the resistance had given to her. She eventually found a pair of old pilots trousers and a robe that draped over her belly, covering pretty much everything that needed to be covered.
Rey stepped out of her quarters warily, not wanting anyone to see her like this. Luckily for her it was the dead of night, and the only people that were up were the sleleton crew who were all on the upper levels of the base. She walked slowly down the corridor, still trying to get used to the sudden new weight on her body. She walked up a flight of stairs that led to what looked like an office, the open door showing a desk, a holo-table and other things. Rey headed towards it and peeked inside. She saw General Leia Organa sat at the table looking at a display of some sort. Rey knocked gently on the door. Leia turned her head and saw Rey, who looked a little spooked and afraid looking in.
“You must be Rey” she said, rembering what Finn had said about her.

“Now, I don’t remember hearing about that” Leia said, staring at Rey’s bulging belly..” So why don’t you explain what happened”
Rey sat down at the table, and rested her hands on top of her belly. She explained what had happened to Leia, who listened tentatively. She comforted Rey as she told her what had happened.
“So are you still going to find Luke?” Leia asked.
“I guess so.” Rey replied.”the voice said something about founding a new jedi order, so Luke might know what to do”

“I think.....”

153221122212.content:
Thankfully, nothing had changed. She was still the thin scavenger that she'd always been. She placed a gentle hand on her middle, feeling her flat and tight abdomen.

"What was that all about?" she asked herself.

"I was about to ask the same thing," asked voice near the doorway of her quarters.

Rey quickly jerked her head to see who was there. It was Leia, a warm smile on her face.

"Everything okay?" the general asked.

"I...yes. Just a bad dream, I suppose," she responded, wiping beads of sweat off of her forehead.

Suddenly, Rey's stomach turned, a wave of nausea running through her. She covered her mouth and ran to the nearby waste bin as she emptied the contents of her stomach.

Leia approached her and patted her back. After a few more hurls, Rey got back up, wiping her mouth.

"Nervous?" Leia asked.

"Must be. I felt fine earlier."

"Don't worry. The Force chose you to be the one to bring back the light for a reason. I know you can convince Luke to return. I know you will," she said.

Rey nodded. "I should get on, then. How will I know if Finn wakes up?"

"Just focus on Luke. Finn can wait, I promise. But I don't think we'll be here when you get back. First Order could arrive at any second. Here. Take this," Leia said, pulling out an armband with a glowing blue light.

"This'll help you find us. A light to guide your way home," she explained, as the scavenger put it in her bag.

"Thank you," Rey said, giving the general a hug.

"Oh, it's nothing. May the Force be with you," Leia said.

Rey gathered her things and headed to the Falcon, where Chewie and R2 were waiting. Inside the cockpit, she and the Wookie began to get the ship warmed up. Her stomach still felt a little queasy, but not nearly as bad as it had been.

She looked at Chewie and smiled. "Let's go find Luke Skywalker."
153221122212.title: Nothing (accelerated pregnancy)

1532211222121.content:
The journey to Ahch-to was mostly uneventful. Rey had to excuse herself a few times to vomit, even sitting away from the cockpit to avoid motion sickness. She blamed her sickness on nerves. She also raided the food stores a few times, wolfing down several rations in a very short time, again blaming it on anxiety. She noticed that she was looking a little bloated, and her clothes felt a little snug, but she thought rhat it was the food she had just eaten.
Soon enough the Falcon dropped out of hyperspace and they pulled towards a deep blue planet, approachimg the surface quickly. They came across a small archipelago noticing some small ruined structures on one of them and, as they got closer, a figure on a heavy cloak stood on top of a ridge. Rey knew that this was it. They found a flat outcrop to land the Falcon on, and disembarked quickly.
Rey walked towards a set of steps, turning to face R2 and Chewbacca. She smiled at them before going on her way. She hiked up a huge set of steep, rocky steps, taking in the ciew as she climbed. By the time she made it to what looked like a few old huts she was very out of breath, moreso than usual, but she again pushed it aside as nerves. She carried on up the ancient steps.
The steps eventually opened up to a rocky plateau at the top of a ridge, where a figure stood. They turned to face Rey, and pulled off their hood, revealing an slightly withered face, but one that was still recognisable. It was him. Luke Skywalker. He was real. Rey reached into her pack, and pulled out the lightsaber that had belonged to his father. She stretched her arm out towards him and waited.
1532211222121.title: Ahch-to

choices: Rey finds a hut to stay in (RESERVED)
15322112221211.content:
Luke reached out and grabbed the lightsaber, his hands trembling. Then he chucked it over his shoulder onto the cliff behind him. He frowned at her as he walked by.

"Master Skywalker!" she called out in shock.

Luke retreated to his hut, which was locked shut. Luckily, she knew someone who could get it open.

The door burst open as Rey and Chewbacca entered. Luke stood up.

"Chewie, what are you doing here?" he asked.

Rey stepped up. "He said you're coming back with us. We're going back to the Falcon."

"Falcon?" Luke asked, his eyes widening. "Wait...where's Han?"

~~~~~~~~~~~~~
After Rey filled Luke in on what had happened, she made her plea.

"Kylo Ren and the First Order have only grown stronger. If the Resistance doesn't stop them, they'll take over the galaxy. Leia sent me. We need your help," Rey said.

Luke looked her over. "I can't help you. You expect me to take on the First Order by myself? I can't be the one to shift the tide. And if the Resistance sent a girl with a gut to try to bring me back, they must be in worse shape than I thought."

Rey got flustered, putting a hand on her bloated middle. "I...hey!"

Luke walked off down the hill.

Rey refused to give up. She followed him as he fished, as he milked a large creature resting on the beach, and as he continued his trek around the island. As they walked through a grassy field, Rey stopped when she heard a voice. She followed it, and was led to a hollowed-out tree.

"Rey..." it called out. It was the same voice she heard earlier.

"You have done well on your journey so far. Continue on your path. The Force will be balanced in a week's time..." it concluded.

"Wait...what do you mean?" she asked, but the voice didn't respond.

Deeper into the tree, she found a shelf covered with old books riddled with dust. The room suddenly grew darker, as a figure entered the room. It was Luke.

"Who are you?" he asked.

"I...I've been here before," Rey said.

"It's been here for thousands of years. Holding these," he said, placing a hand on the books.

"The old Jedi texts. The last of a failed religion. Like me. So who are you?" Luke asked again.

"I was sent by the Resistance," she explained.

"And what's so special about you? Where are you from?" Luke wondered.

"Nowhere. Jakku," Rey said.

"Why are you here?"

She shook her head, looking for an answer. "Because...something inside me has always been there, and now it's awake. I'm afraid, and I need help."

Luke nodded. "You need a teacher. I can't do that for you."

"Why not? You're not busy!"

"Because I came here to die. It's time for the Jedi to end," he said, walking out of the tree.
15322112221211.title: The last Jedi (follows that plot)

153221122212111.content:
Rey lingered in the tree for a little while, admiring the ancient carvings in the walls, feeling the rough wood underneath her hands. She left, leading back into the bright sunlight, and walked back towards Lukes hut.
She stood outside the hut, looking around. There was about seven or so huts dotted about, surrounding a small courtyard overlooking the sea. She walked over to the hut on the opposite sude of the yard to Lukes, gently opening the rusty door. Inside was an old stone bedframe and a stool. Unpacking what little she had, Rey set up the hut as hers, rolling out a bedroll and putting her bag down in the corner.
As she sat down, Luke opened the door abruptly.
“Tomorrow, at dawn. Meet me outside” he said quickly.
“Are you going to train me?” Rey said, a smile breaking out on her face.
“Im going to try” Luke responded, leaving before Rey could say anymore.
She looked outside a small window, noticing that it was starting to get dark, and started to undress. She took of her gloves and jacket, leaving her in a tank top. She looked down, conscious of the comment Luke had made earlier. Now that she thought about it, she did look significantly rounder around her midriff, which explained why her shirt was beginning to feel tight. She undid her belt, immediately feeling relief as her belly was freed. She put her hands to it, feeling it through her shirt gingerly. She lifted off her shirt and placed her hands on it warily. It didn’t feel loose or jiggly like fat did. It felt tighter, like she was bloated, but it still felt different to even that. It stuck out around 4 inches, and was very lightly stretching her skin. She massaged it a little, trying to get rid of the bloat to no avail. She then noticed that her breasts had grown a little as well, her bra cutting into her shoulder a little more than usual, and they felt quite tender. She rubbed her breasts a little, allieviating the feeling.
Her stomach grumbled, and she grabbed some rations from her bag. She quickly unwrapped them and wolfed them down, quickly regretting eating them so fast, and then rembering that she had more. She went back for seconds, but realised about halfway through that her bump had gotten about 3/4s of an inch bigger, pushing out further. Rey lay down on her bed, a hand cradling her belly as she drifted to sleep.
153221122212111.title: Rey finds a hut to stay in (RESERVED)

1532211222121111.content:
Rey was up before dawn. She sat up, blanket wrapped around her as she stared at the fire. She was pretty nervous about the journey ahead. Afraid that Luke might reject her. Afraid that she might not be able to bring him back.

Her stomach rumbled, and she grabbed some more portions out of her bag, scarfing them down quickly. Rey had no idea why she was so hungry lately. As she munched on the food, an uneasy feeling washed over her. A feeling of dread.

Then she saw him. Kylo Ren. He was there, staring directly at her. On instinct, she grabbed her blaster and fired at him. Once the smoke settled, she realized that he was gone. In fact, he was never really there at all. But it seemed so real. Rey looked up and saw the damage she had done. The shot had created a large hole in the upper corner of the stone hut.

Rey scrambled up, surprised that she felt a little heavy, and exited the hut. Outside, the frog-like caretakers were scrambling as they attempted to clean up the mess. Blanket still wrapped around her, Rey slowly approached the caretakers.

"Sorry..." she muttered, but they were too focused on the task at hand to pay attention.

"What's that about?" Luke asked, emerging from his hut.

"Um...blaster went off while it was inspecting. Stupid mistake," Rey said.

Luke nodded. "Get dressed and be ready to train," he said, returning to the hut.

Back in her quarters, Rey removed the blanket. That heaviness she felt earlier made sense. Her stomach had grown since last night. It looked like she had swallowed a small melon, her shirt revealing a sliver of pale flesh. It pushed out nearly ten inches now. Rey slowly turned around and plodded towards him, her belly bumping into him. She sighed, then went back to her attempt to persuade him.

"You'll turn. I'll help you," she whispered. "I saw it."

Kylo Ren spoke up for the first time. "I saw something, too. I know when the moment comes that you'll be the one to turn. Rey, I saw who your parents are."

Before Rey could say anything else, the elevator stopped. She backed up against the door, and it opened. It was Snoke's lair. He sat on a chair, surrounded by eight guards that wore red armor. Kylo grabbed her arm and took her into the room.

"Well done, my faithful apprentice. Young Rey. It seems that you're in quite the predicament. Welcome," Snoke said, his voice echoing throughout the room.

Kylo Ren kneeled, and was a few feet behind Rey as she stood before Snoke. Her shackles were unlocked, and she shook her wrists.

"Come closer, child," he beckoned.

Rey refused his order, standing still. She didn't want to admit that it was because she was too tired to walk anymore, but that was part of the reason.

"So much strength. Darkness rises and light to meet it. And look at what you've brought us, what you'll soon bring into this galaxy. I warned my apprentice that as he grew stronger, his equal in the light would rise," Snoke said, using the Force to pull the lightsaber from Kylo's grasp.

"Skywalker, I assumed. Wrongly," he continued, turning the saber over in his hand. He set it on the armrest beside him.

"But this? This is much better. Closer, I said," Snoke seethed.

Rey's heels lifted off the ground, and she was pulled in towards him, massive stomach leading the way. The babies were beginning to get restless.

"You underestimate Skywalker. And Ben Solo. And me," she said.

Now, she was mere inches away from Snoke. "Oh, have you seen something? A weakness in my apprentice? Is that why you came?"

He laughed maniacally. "It was I who linked your minds, I stoked Ren's conflict."

Kylo looked up for the first time as Snoke continued. "I knew he was not strong enough to hide it. And you were not wise enough to resist."

He pulled her even closer. He extended a hand, and pressed it against Rey's belly. This sent the babies into a frenzy, as they thrashed and kicked wildly, so strong that it felt like they might tear through her swollen skin. Rey whimpered in pain.

"Now, you have a choice. Give me the location of Skywalker, and join Ren and I as we train a new generation of darkside users. Or die," Snoke said.

"No..." Rey said, growing weak.

Snoke snarled and pushed her away, suspending her high in the air. He reached his arm out and closed his eyes. "Tell me everything."

Rey screamed in pain, and the babies tumbled and stretched inside her increasingly cramped womb.
1532211222121111111111111111111.title: She gets picked up by the first order

choices: The ship doesn't arrive, she's stuck
15322112221211111111111111111111.content:
Snoke finally relinquished his grip, and Rey fell on her back. She quickly put her hands over her belly, and the movement told her that the babies were alright.

"I didn't expect Skywalker to be so wise. We will give him and the Jedi the death he desires. After the rebels are finished, we will destroy the entire island," he cackled.

With all her might, Rey got up and tried to pull the saber away. It flew towards her, then past her, smacking her in the back to the head as it returned to Snoke's possession.

"Such spunk. Look here now," he said, pulling him towards what appeared to be a telescope.

Rey looked into it, and saw Resistance ships being obliterated. "The entire Resistance. Soon they'll all be gone."

Rey turned, her belly knocking the telescope over, and pulled Kylo's saber. She ignited it, but was quickly surrounded by the guards.

Snoke smiled. "Still that fiery spirit. You have the heart of a Jedi. And because of that, you will die like one."

Rey plodded towards him, and Snoke flicked her away with the Force. The lightsaber clattered at Kylo's feet, spinning before him. Rey slowly sat up.

"What about the babies? If you kill me, you kill them," Rey explained.

"You appear to be far enough along that the babies would survive if we were to remove them from your womb shortly after your passing. Face it, little girl. You are nothing more than a vessel for these bastard children. That's all you'll ever be."

Snoke rotated her to face Kylo. "You know what you must do. There is resolve in your heart. I cannot be beaten. I see his mind, his every intent."

Kylo stood up and grabbed his lightsaber. He held it in front of Rey's head. Snoke closed his eyes.

"I see him turning the lightsaber to strike."

Out of the corner of her eye, she saw Ben's free hand doing something by his side, but she couldn't see it clearly.

She couldn't see it, and Snoke couldn't either, but her saber was slowly turning sideways on Snoke's chair.

"And now...he KILLS HIS TRUE ENEMY!"

A lightsaber ignited, and a blue light shined on Snoke's shock-filled face. Rey collapsed, and saw what had happened. She pulled her saber towards her, catching it as Snoke's top half collapsed on the floor. Kylo helped her up, and they soon were surrounded by guards.

The two looked each other in the eye. They understood what they had to do, and both ignited their sabers as they stood back to back.

They fought the guards valiantly, Kylo trying his best to protect Rey. Throughout the fight, she kept a protective hand on her belly as her babies bounced and kicked from all of the activity. She was slower, and extremely slow on breath.

Still, she was strong with the Force, and was able to take out the attackers. Once they finished the battle, Rey and Kylo met in the middle of the room. Rey looked out of the window at the fleeing Resistance ships.

"There's still time! We can stop the attack on the ships!" Rey said.

She heard no response, and turned around. "Ben?"

Kylo stared straight ahead, his eyes wild. "It's time to let old things die."

He walked towards her. "The Sith. The Jedi. Skywalker, Snoke. The rebels. Let it all die."

Kylo extended a hand. "Rey, I want you to join me. Together, we can rule and bring a new order. With these children that you carry, do you realize what we can accomplish?"

Tears streamed from Rey's eyes. "Don't do this, Ben. Please don't go this way."

"You're still holding on! Let go!" he exploded.

Rey took a deep breath, putting her hands on the side of her belly.

"Do you wanna know the truth about your parents? Or have you always known? Go on, say it," he implored.

She shook her head. "They were nobody."

"Filthy junk traders that sold you for drinking money. Dead in a pauper's grave in the desert. You have no place in this story. You come from nothing--you're nothing. But not to me. Join me. Please," he pleaded.

She couldn't do it. If she did his, she'd be no better than her parents. If she ruled the galaxy alongside Ren, there'd be no way she could care for them as much as she wanted to. And now, aside from helping the resistance that's all she wanted to do.

Rey reached out a hand, and used it to pull her saber from the ground. Kylo caught on to this, and pulled with all his might. The lightsaber hung in the air, vibrating violently.

The pressure was just too much, and the sword exploded. A gigantic crash tore through the middle of the ship, as the Raddus cruiser jumped into light speed directly through it.

Rey stood up, using all of her effort. She looked at Kylo, and saw that he was lying on the ground, unconscious. She pulled out her homing device and clicked it, hoping that the Falcon would pick it up.
15322112221211111111111111111111.title: Continue (RESERVED)

153221122212111111111111111111111.content:
Rey waddled her way through the crumblimg ship, the halways erily empty. She held in her hands the remains of the sabre and her homing beavon, clinging onto both to avoid losing them. She was waddling as fast as she could, wanting to get out of the ship as quickly as possible. The resistance needed her. She found a hamgar bay that was mostly intact, but again empty. Rey sat and waited for the falcon to arrive, amd began rubbing her belly.

Since the encounter with Snoke, her babies had been kicking, fluxuating between hard and gentle, but they were still obviously rattled. She rubbed hwr belly trying to calm them down, pushing lightly on the little bumps they made.

“Calm down now, we’re alright,” she reassured, not just get belly but herself as well.

When she heard the falcon approaching, she tried to stand up to no avail, resort g to using the force to pull herself up off of the ground. The falcon swooped i to the hanger, and the landing bay opened, revealing R2 buzzing worriedly at the top of the ramp. Rey smiled as she waddled her way uo the ramp, assuring R2 that she, and her babies were fine.

She waddled into the cockpit to check on Chewie, reassuring him as well. As she was talking she felt a kick at her bladder, grunting at the movement. She excused herself and waddled quickly to the bathroom, the babies still kicking her bladder as she walked. She very nearly wet herself, but she just made it to the bathroom, feeling immense relief.

She waddled out of the bathroom into the mess area, where Chewie was sat eating some portions and talking to R2. She sat next to him, pushing her belly out to the side, and gravbing some portions to eat. She began wolfing them down, the days events tiring her out.

Chewie growled, asking a question.

“Not good. He’s beyond saving.” Rey said sullenly

Both Chewie and R2 made reassuring sounds, trying to comfort Rey.

”Thanks, guys. But what's important now is that we help the resistance. They need us” Rey replied thoughtfully.

After their meal, Rey retreated to her quarters, desperate to rest after what had gone down that day. She pulled off her clothes, slowly striking down to her underwear. She gazed in the mirror at herself, thinking her belly looked ridiculous on her small frame, dwarfing the rest of her body. She rested her hands on top of it as she inspected how large she was. She was surprised that she hadn't given birth yet, given her size. Maybe something was wrong, maybe she was only just at the beginning, maybe they would never come out. Questions flew through her head as she tried to find a comfortable position to sleep, and tried to calm down her evidently hyperactive children, who were kicking around inside. She drifted off to sleep with a gentle hand resting on her bump.

Rey woke up to the feeling of a storm of kicks inside of her. She knew that she hadn't been asleep for long, as she woke up more tired than when she had fallen asleep. She sat up and rubbed her belly, trying to calm the young inside her. She heaved herself off of the bed and started pacing her room to calm them down as well, hoping to tire them out somehow. She opened the door and wandered about the falcon. She could hear Chewie growling at something in the cockpit and R2 responding with a few beeps and chirps. She wandered into the mess room and grabbed a couple portions, holing that food would calm down her brood.

She returned to her room, halfway through another portion when she finally felt her occupants stop kicking. Sighing as she lay down, again struggling to get comfortable, but this time without the interruptions of her occupants kicking her repeatedly.

---------

Rey opened her eyes slowly. She couldn't feel any porgs nestled against her belly, but she could definitely feel that it had grown. She looked down to see that overnight it had expanded massively, another few inches having been added onto the already gigantic mound of her belly. She watched herself in the mirror, her frame now almost completely obscured by her belly.

She went I'm for her usual move of swinging herself up, but was stopped before she could stand. She tried again, more forcefully, but with the same result. She was very much slightly stuck under her own belly. She tried lowering herself off the bed, only to fall on her backside, leaving her worse off than when she had started. She grunted as she tried to stand up again, unable to do so. After what felt like half an hour of trying to stand, Rey, resorted to pulling herself up with the force, her legs not used to the weight.

She inspected herself in the mirror and noticed something strange about her belly. It seemed to have dropped slightly, hanging off of her body. Rey assumed that it was due to the sheer weight of it, unaware of what it really meant for her

She grabbed some underwear from her pack and put it on, struggling to hoist up her panties with her new girth providing a challenging obstacle. She grabbed a skirt and pulled them on, to try and cover a little more than the necessities.

Rey waddled out to the mess area and grabbed a few portions to eat for her breakfast. As she began wolfing down her food, she saw Chewie walk in to grab some food for himself.

”how long will it be till we arrive?” she asked him, concerned for her friends.

Chewie growled and shrugged.

”Okay good, the sooner the better” Rey responded, hoping to arrive fast enough to help the resistance

After her breakfast, she left for her room to finish getting ready. She was crouching down to grab a shirt when she felt something in her belly. It felt sort of like a kick, but softer and quicker. She stood up, concerned about what was happening. Her belly was churning and gurgling, her babies starting to kick up a storm. Rey watched her belly and was shocked to see it growing before her own eyes. The shock of it sent her falling to the bed, unable to stand both from the weight and from watching her belly expand by a couple of inches. Her skin felt tighter than before, pulled to its absolute limit now.

”I can't get any bigger now, surely!” Rey exclaimed in disbelief. ”I feel like I might explode now!”
153221122212111111111111111111111.title: The Falcon arrives (RESERVED)

1532211222121111111111111111111111.content:
Rey grunted, standing up with all her might. Her legs shook, straining mightily under the weight of her belly. She caught her breath and waddled back to the Falcon's cockpit.

They had arrived. The stunning white-colored salt planet of Crait came into view. A blue hue glowed around it.

The armband that Leia had given her was beeping faster now. They were getting close.

"Pull in closer, Chewie. We should find them soon."

Chewbacca nodded. Suddenly, Rey's stomach tightened, her belly becoming painfully hard as the muscles shortened. She kneeled over as much as she good, placing a hand on the side of her belly. This was different than the growth spurt that she had just experienced. Maybe her body couldn't take it anymore. Maybe she really was about to burst.

"Oh...." she moaned.

Chewie turned and growled, a hint of worry in his voice. Rey shook him off.

"I'm fine, it's okay. I'll get on the gunner. I have a feeling we're about to have trouble."

Rey waddled out of the cockpit and made her way to the gunner turret. Carefully, she climbed up the ladder to where the turret was, almost slipping a few times. As she sat down, her belly pressed into the controls.

"Great," she sighed.

Her belly gurgled and churned once more, the babies tumbling around. Her stomach pushed forward another two inches, straining the fabric of her clothes. She was greeted by more kicks and stretches as she rubbed her impossibly huge belly.

"I don't know if you have any control over this, but please, please stop..."

The Falcon flew close to the surface of the planet. In the distance, Chewie spotted some TIE fighters swooping downwards. Their ship was overlooking a cliff, and down below they saw Resistance fighters defending a base using speeders.

On the turret's radar, three TIE fighters pulled into view. Above the ground, they were closing in on a few speeders that were heading towards First Order walkers and a giant drill. The TIEs lined up perfectly, and Rey fired, taking them all out and giving the Resistance soldiers, who unbeknownst to Rey were actually Finn, Poe, and Rose, more time.

"Woo! I like this!" Rey exclaimed, finding a rare moment of pure happiness.

She had an idea, and brought the headset's microphone to her mouth. "Peel off from the battle and draw them away from the speeders!"

Chewie growled, and did as he was told. The Falcon dipped upwards, and the fighters followed suit.

As they continued to fly, Rey's belly tightened again. The pain was too much for her to see straight, and all of her shots at the pursuing ships were off. Chewie took the ship into a crack in the planet's surface, which led to a red crystalline cave. The cave was extremely narrow, and was causing damage to the turret as it scared against the cave's walls.

"Chewie!" Rey yelled.

The Wookiee growled, trying his best to fix the situation. The ship lifted up and flipped through the cave, and the ships behind them exploded as they collided into the crystals that stuck out nearly ten feet. A wrong move caused another hit to the turret, knocking it off completely.

Smoke filled the gunner position, causing Rey to back away. "Ahh!"

She climbed down the ladder slowly, and waddled back to the cockpit's seat. Once they reached the surface again, the battle appeared to be done. They sped overhead, and saw that a giant hole had been blasted into the front of the base. The walkers, and the drill, were closing in on the rebels. They had to rescue them--and fast.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Inside the base, Leia sat alone, save for C-3PO and a few soldiers. Her attempts to call for help had failed. Nobody responded. Near the base's walls, Finn and Poe were watching the First Order slowly approach. They were trapped, with no other exit out of the base except for the front, and that would be suicide.

A shadow filled the room, and a hooded figure entered the room. Could it be? The figure approached Leia and lowered their hood. It was Luke. He sat down next to her.

Leia spoke first. "I know what you're gonna say. I changed my hair."

Luke scoffed. She hadn't changed at all. "Looks nice that way. Leia, I'm sorry. Something's happened to the girl you sent, Rey. Like the mother of our father, the Force has chosen her to carry life and bring it into the world. I...again...I'm sorry. That I couldn't be there for you."

"I know you are. But I'm glad you're here. At the end."

Luke shook his head. "I came to face him. I can't save him."

Leia looked down, trying not to cry. "I held out hope for so long, but...I know my son is gone."

No one's ever really gone," he replied.

He put out a hand, and Leia took it. He put something in hers. Han's dice from the Millennium Falcon, but they felt weightless. Wait a minute...

Leia looked at her brother, who raised his eyebrows. He stood up and kissed her on the top of her head. Luke exited the control room and headed towards the hole in the base, taking on the First Order by himself and renewing his status as a legend.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

In the sky, Rey and Chewie looked for any sign of the rebels. She winced as her stomach tightened again. Then, she felt it.

Luke was gone. She could feel that he never really left the island, and she knew that he had become one with the Force. Her heart sank.

Chewbacca growled, forcing Rey to come back to the situation at hand. Her bracelet was beeping nonstop. They had to be close.

"We're right above them! R2, keep scanning for life forms!" Rey said.
1532211222121111111111111111111111.title: They arrive at Crait

15322112221211111111111111111111111.content:
Rey searched desperately along the ground for any sign of the Resistance, but all she could see was stones and mountains. She searched along the surface of the white rocks and spotted something moving around outside. As she looked closer she saw that some crystalline wolf-like animals were squeezing through a small gap in the cliff.

”Chewie, down there!” she called out. ”that's where they are!”

Chewie settled the falcon on top of a ridge, above the exit of the caverns. Rey was stood impatiently at the top of the ramp as it slowly lowered down. She waddled her way down the ramp, holding a hand on her belly as it tightened as she walked. She looked down and saw the steep rock face that she would have to scale to reach the cave. Sighing, she began scaling down the side, trying to steady herself as her belly contracted and threw her off balance.

She reached the bottom only to see that the creatures had been squeezing themselves through a tiny gap, nowhere near large enough to let a person through. Rey could sense the people behind the rocks, desperate to escape. She closed her eyes and focused, lifting her hand. She focused on the people and saving them, and she felt the force flow through her as she lifted the rocks, opening the way for the resistance.

She opened her eyes and watched as dozens of people began flowing out of the cave. She smiled, knowing that there was hope, and looked through the crowd for Finn. She saw him at the back, ushering people forward, and their eyes met. They both smiled and he ran towards her. Rey lowered her hand, the cave now empty, and put her arms out for Finn. He broke through the crowd to her and saw her belly. His eyes grew wide as he stepped towards her.

”Well, you've certainly changed, ” he said in awe.

”Yep, ” she replied, smiling. She hugged him tightly. ”Its good to see you again, ”

Finn didn't respond but hugged her tightly, glad to see that she was Ok. Then he felt himself being pushed away by something but saw that Rey was still hugging him. She looked down and saw that her belly had grown again, stretching her skin out even tighter.

”Was that...?” Finn asked.

”The force. It's a long story, I'll explain later” Rey said, leading him towards the falcon.

Rey noticed General Organa helping others up the hill and walked over to her. Leia looked at her curiously, and gestured to her belly.

”That's new, ” she said jokingly.

”Yeah, it's definitely new, ” Rey said with a smile. ”This is how the force is supposed to work, right?”

Leia smiled knowingly. ”The force works mysteriously, but I know that this is right, ”

Rey smiled at her as she stepped back onto the falcon. She turned to close the airlock and saw Ben standing in front of her, dressed in deep black robes. She could do nothing but look t him with disdain as the doors closed, shutting him out.

The falcon was now full of people, giving Rey a difficult time moving about. She was leant on the wall when a man with black hair approached her smiling.

”So you must be Rey. Poe Dameron, ” he said, introducing himself.

”It's nice to finally meet you, BB8 always talked about you, ” Rey replied happily.

”And Finn liked to talk about you, but I guess he didn't tell us everything, ” he gestured to her belly.

”Well, he didn't know about this. Don't ask, it's a very long story” Rey said, his mouth slightly agape in shock.

Rey saw Leia sat on a few crates in the centre of the room and waddled her way towards her, sitting down in a huff. She could feel her belly contracting as she sat down, and tried to hide her pain from anyone. Both women smiled at each other, not needing to say much. Poe approached Leia, looking concerned.

”General, how are we supposed to rebuild the resistance with this? There's so few of us left, ” He asked quietly.

Leia simply smiled and put a hand to Rey's belly. ”we have all that we need right here, ” she said, putting Rey's belly gently.

Rey’s children must have known what timing was because at that moment Rey felt a rush of fluids between her legs and her belly contracted again, harder than before. She looked up at Leia, scared.

”I think they're coming” was all she needed to say.

Leia helped her up and took her as quickly as she could to the med bay. She called in a few others to help her and got started immediately. She got Rey ready to give birth, pulling her dress off.

”Rey, you're going to need to push, okay?” She said, coaching Rey through it. ”Ready? And push!”

Rey started pushing down, screaming in pain as she felt the first baby crowning. She pushed and pushed, and felt the baby come out, feeling slightly relieved.

”how am I... Doing?” she asked, starting to sweat.

”You're doing great, the first one is out” Leia said, reassuring Rey.

Rey started to bear down again and felt the second baby starting to come out. Rey groaned as she pushed again, the second baby now out. She could feel the next one moving down and watched as her belly shifted as her babies moved around. She pushed, grunting as the next baby crowned, and another push was all it needed to come out.

”Three down Rey, you're doing fantastic!” Leia said encouraging Rey.

Rey could feel herself growing more tired, and she had seven more to go. ”I can't, I'm t-too tired, ”

”You can do this, ” she heard Finn say behind her. He knelt next to her and held her hand. ”come on, you can do this, ”

Rey pushed and gritted her teeth, trying not to scream. She squeezed on Finn's hand as she pushed, and felt one of the babies come out, followed by another in quick succession. She took a deep breath.

”This is going very quickly Rey, you'll be done in no time!”

She pushed again and felt the sixth crowning and coming out. By this point, she could see that her belly had visibly shrunk, and was covered in a thin layer of glistening sweat. She pushed again, rushing to get the seventh out.

”Seven done Rey! Not long now!” Leia said as she swaddled the seventh baby.

Rey smiled a little, glad to have Leia and Finn with her. She pushed again and felt the eighth come out, quicker than the others. She could feel the ninth moving around and pushed again, this one taking a little longer than the previous. Another push freed it, and Rey's belly was now only carrying one last baby. She groaned as she pushed one last time, and she smiled as she felt the tenth and final baby slip free. Before she got a chance to look at her children, she began to black out from fatigue.

Rey woke up later, looking down to the unfamiliar sight of a flat belly. There was still a roundness to it, but nothing like it had been. She saw Leia, Finn and Poe all in the room, fawning over the babies.

”How are they?” Rey asked weakly.

”Very strong. Four boys, and six Girls” Finn replied, bringing one of them to Rey.

Rey took the baby in her arms and smiled. She was a mother.
